This game was made in one hour (actually 72 minutes) for the 0hour game development challenge. http://0hgame.eu/ Use your green shield to protect yourself. Move the shield by touching the screen. Hint: To be safe, block stars a little way away from spaceman. I was able to get to level 30 on a tablet lately. :) This is untested on older phones and will probably be slow there.

Think you can tell the difference between a Boeing 737 and an Airbus A320? This app will test you! Airplane Quiz is a simple game to help you learn over 100 commercial passenger airplanes. Test your knowledge in identifying commercial passenger airplanes from Boeing, Airbus, Saab, Embraer, and more. This version includes: - Pictures of over 100 commercial airplanes to identify - High score The game is pretty simple: You start with 60 seconds on the clock. Each correct answer is worth 5 points on the first try, 3 on the second, 2 on the third, and 0 on the last try. We're sure you'll enjoy Airplane Quiz and find it enjoyable and challenging.
release_text: Added a "Study Guide" to view pictures with answers and train for the quiz. Also added support for tablets.

description: ULTIMATE UPDATE October 24th, 2013 - New Character: Toi Lee, Bubba’s brother from another mother, joins him in his epic struggle to find water! - Two new months, “August” and “September”, have been added, giving you more than 60 awesome new levels to solve. - New addition: Swappable pipes add a whole new challenge to the game that is guaranteed to change your strategies and make this awesome game even more intense! - In App Purchases: Now you can purchase stars and use them to unlock months and new characters. Slumdog Plumber & Pipes Puzzle When a man’s gotta go, a man’s gotta go! Slumdog Plumber & Pipes Puzzle (Nikal Padi) is an exciting, funny and occasionally stinky pipe puzzle game where you must figure out the right arrangement for the plumbing so that our man waiting at the tap can get his pail of water and attend to his “urgent business”! Fail to get the water before time runs out, and our poor constipated friend will have an “accident”! Succeed and you will see him relieved. So don’t keep him waiting! Download and install the game, and play nerve-racking missions of intense fun, farts and laughter with Slumdog Plumber & Pipes Puzzle. Game instructions Construct a continuous pipeline between the valve and water outlet by clicking on the pipe to rotate or swap. Once the proper connections have been made, release the water and proceed to the next level. Make sure you connect the pipes correctly before time runs out, otherwise there will be an "accident." *In case you are wondering, Nikal Padi is a Hindi slang with different contexts. In this case, it means that if you fail to achieve your goal, $hit happens. Pun intended.
release_text: What's New: Version 1.1.6 - 61 new levels (Aug & Sept) - New character - New gameplay (Swappable pipes) Version 1.1.5 - 61 new levels (June & July) - New gameplay (Fixed pipes) Version 1.1.4 - Bug Fix Version 1.1.3 - 61 new levels added (April & May) - New UI to enable easier navigation Version 1.1.2 - Allocation of stars based on performance fixed - More funny sounds & expressions added Version 1.1.1 - Easier to exit once ur done playing Version 1.1.0 - 59 Levels (Feb & March)

description: Thanks for a breakthrough of 2 million downloads! *Let Princess kick the "soldiers" up high!* Princess Punt, the new genre of game called "Action Puzzle RPG", is now debut! The stage-based format game, the great combineationf of exciting features of puzzle and elements of RPG, is now available for your smartphones and tablet play! [Features] Interactive touching gameplay is easy and fun to play for everyone! Rules are simple! But the gameplay is Not!! Surely addictive and can't regist! Battle with your own characters that you raised. [Description] 1.Control "Princess" to kick the "soldiers" toward monsters! => Clear stages by defeating all monsters. 2.Amont of damage depends on where you hit on the monsters. => Aim at the weak point to give even bigger damage! Each monster has different weak points. 3.One-tap strategies => Release special skills of the arms by tapping the screen while solders are in the air. To clear the stage, you need to work out strategies like a puzzle with your character to beat up the monsters. In order to strengthen your character, you have to level up your arms and/or to change the weapons to stronger one. Different kinds of weapons with special skills are available, such as Swords, Bows, Spears, and Wands. Special skills can be released by tapping the screen while a solder is in the air. Keep going to clear the one area to another. You need to defeat an awful boss at the end of each stage. Defeating the Special Boss, which appears randomly, is the chance to get rare items! ◆XPERIA PLAY Optimized ◆Princess Punt meets Heyzap! 　Check in to the Heyzap and see who's playing Princess Punt! 　Check in by tapping the Z button on the title. 　>About Heyzap, visit http://www.heyzap.com/ By downloading our contents, you agree to the following terms and conditions and the software license agreement. For PC users: http://www.gungho.jp/kpq/privacy.html For Mobile users: http://mobile.gungho.jp/news/kpq/privacy.html

release_text: Mammals Of Britain v2.3.4 - habitat information added for common mammals - bug and data fixes

description: Retro edition of Pinball Invarders, the unique combination of pinball and space invaders! • Play with 2 balls at same time to defeat the monsters. • You got 2x5 balls from the beginning and easy to get extra balls. • Continuous gameplay and auto launch system. • With music remixes from C-64 era.

Trillian is an instant messaging app that works on phones, tablets, and desktops while keeping your chats neatly synchronized between all of them! We think conversation should be easily shared between all of your devices, not trapped as text messages on your phone. Here's how we do it: • INSTANT MESSAGING: Your unique Trillian username can be used to send unlimited messages free of charge. Trillian uses your existing data plan and/or WiFi. • ANYWHERE: Trillian's continuous client feature delivers your chats instantly between all of your connected devices. In addition, Trillian automatically silences push notifications on mobile devices if you're active on a desktop - no more dealing with a phone buzzing on your desk all day! • SIMPLE: Trillian places a strong emphasis on fast and reliable message delivery and a beautiful, easy-to-use interface. • SECURE: All communication with Trillian servers uses TLS to ensure third-parties can't read your chats. • INTEROPERABLE: Of course, Trillian wouldn't be Trillian without support for Facebook Chat, MSN, GTalk, AIM, ICQ, Yahoo!, and Jabber.
release_text: • Notification improvements. • Mobile indicator can now be disabled. • Fixed issue with not being able to send photos from gallery. • Fixed issues with large and empty bubbles. • Full changelog: https://www.trillian.im/changelog/android/3.0/

description: -------------------------- MY NEW APP Unlock with WiFi unlocks your device when you're connected to your home WiFi! https://market.android.com/details?id=com.benhirashima.unlockwithwifi -------------------------- Sometimes you're viewing a web page in a browser, and you decide you want to open it in a different browser. Maybe the page looks funny or it's loading slowly in the current browser. How do you open a page you're already viewing in another browser? Well, you could copy and paste the URL, but that's more work than it should be. Now you can use Choose Browser. If you "share" a page or link from any app, you can select Choose Browser, then you will be presented with a list of installed browsers. You can share a link from one browser to another. You can share a link from, say, your RSS reader, and choose which browser to open it in. It's nothing fancy, but it saves you a little time. The app is very handy for mobile web development, when you have to test your website in different browsers. If this app doesn't work on your device, please email me, and I will fix it. This app may not work on some recent HTC phones, because of a change HTC has made to their version Android. You can thank Apple and it's lawyers for that. This app is free, with no ads.

*** This app requires a device that supports stylus pen input like Galaxy Note Series with S-Pen*** *** Additional server program(can be downloaded from http://www.sunnysidesoft.com/virtualtablet ) should be running on your PC(support both Windows & Mac) to start this app*** ** VirtualTablet Lite version with AD is also available in store ** ** You can buy the full version of VirtualTablet with no Ad in the store ** Turn your tablet device into wireless digitizer! description: Download the Trucker App & GPS for Truckers free today! Trucker App & GPS for Truckers is the number one app for Truckers, turn by turn directions that allows you to add multiple locations and avoid locations. The Trucker GPS gives you all the benefits of directions with the capability to add any stops you want, up to a total of 7 stops! View Weight Stations, Travel Centers, Rest Areas, and Much More! With options to have direct navigation, or route planner no matter where you are going the Trucker App & GPS for Truckers will get you there. Trucker App & GPS for Truckers Features: - MPG price calculator - Share your location with friends - Rerouting to avoid areas you do not want to stop at - Direct Navigation - Auto-finish option when typing ending destination - Turn by Turn Voice Guided Navigation - Listed Directions and Interactive Map - Satellite or Map views - Add Terrain with Map view - Add Labels with Satellite view - Route Planner to let you add stops along your trip - Weigh Station Locations - Travel Centers - Business Locations - Add up to 7 total stops to the route planner - Add stops options let you calculate your trip with out the stops and then with the stops - Get route takes you to a map that can easily change to a listed direction and back to the map - Add places to your map including: Travel Centers, Rest Areas, and Weigh Stations - Free 7 Day Trial for Full Access of Route Planner only 8.99 a month! - Mileage Calculator - Feedback - Help button - Google Integration The Trucker App & GPS for Truckers comes with a Mileage Calculator to tell you your MPG, Total Cost for Gas, Price Per Mile for Gas, and total Miles Traveled.  Made specifically for truckers, the Trucker App & GPS for Truckers will let you see Travel Centers, Rest Areas, Weigh Stations with just a push of a button, pick one, pick two or pick all three.  The Trucker App & GPS is designed to let all three show on the map at the same time. No Matter where you want to go the Trucker App & GPS for Truckers is what you need to get you there! Free to Download and only 8.99 a month for the hands on directions you have been waiting for. The Trucker App & GPS is made to make your life easier, with not only directions but mileage information! Not sure if this is the App you want, try the FREE 7 Day trial, you will love it and if you don’t you have nothing to lose! GEOLocation makes it so you can start from anywhere even if you don’t know where you are! Get started with our Trucker GPS system and you'll love how easy it works as you keep your friends up to date on your location. Try Trucker App & GPS for Tuckers today, to make your life easier! Continually updated mapping systems are the key to getting you where you need to be and the Trucker App & GPS has it and more! Disclaimer: We do our best to make sure all of the information is up to date. However due to the massive size and amount of information, It is the responsibility of the user to make sure they are using the application in a responsible way. We will do our best to continue to update and our users may help or assist us by letting us know these issues when arise. We look forward to hearing you, until then enjoy the the mapping application and your trip. If you have any questions or need anything please contact us right away, you can visit our website at http://www.abmobileapps.com . Trucker app is designed to provide the best mapping and guidance features for truckers. This includes showing the locations of scales, weigh stations, travel centers and more. With the integrated GPS system feel free to share your location with friends. Get started today and Download trucker app for truckers now! Our Trucker GPS system is a must have for every trucker driver.

Jump and run your way through 84 action-packed levels spread across SEVEN unique worlds. *** GAMEPLAY *** - use the on-screen touch-controls to jump and run - jump on enemies to defeat them - defeat all enemies to clear a level - clear a level without getting hit to receive the "flawless" star - grab the star at the end of a level to receive the "special" star - receive enough stars to unlock more worlds *** UPDATES *** - new worlds will be available for free in the near future - OpenFeint achievements will come soon *** WARNING *** This game can be extremely difficult :)

You can now try WikiCamps for free for the first 14 days then upgrade to the full version. WikiCamps is a dynamic user generated Camping App for New Zealand. What does this mean? It means all the sites are added, edited and shared by users like yourself! Wikicamps also works offline with the ability to download all site and user content, as well as a high quality offline map. Making WikiCamps the biggest and fastest growing resource for locating Camp Sites, Caravan Parks, Backpacker Hostels, Dump Points, Information Centres, Day Stops and POIs. With over 3,000 sites already and growing every day. And best of all, you will never have to pay for updates. Each site has loads of information to help you plan your get away from camping prices, activities including swimming, fishing, 4x4ing, pet rules, Wi-Fi hotspots, pricing, toilets, showers and heaps more. Add and view photos from other happy campers all around New Zealand. So you can see what the camp site is like before you go there. Rate sites as you go and add them to your own personal favourites list. With heaps of extra gadgets including at no extra cost: * Camping Checklist * Satellite dish pointer * Chat Forum * Compass * Home Clock * High Quality Offline Map
release_text: * New look * Faster database access * Added weather to site details * Added new facility icons * Bug fixes

description: This app shows you how to play the most used chords for the guitar. Suited for beginners and intermediates, you can play back the chords to make sure you're playing them right. You can even choose between Electric and Acoustic guitar sounds! All permissions except for VIBRATE are for serving adverts, which support the development of this app. Key Features: - Play and Learn Chords - - Authentic Acoustic and Electric guitar sounds - - For Beginners and Intermediates - - Features most used guitar chords - - Simple and Easy to use! - - Free! - In order to give you a free app and keep developing more free apps/updates in the future, we have integrated an optional search tool to with our application. If accepted, this will add a few access points to your device (hence the permissions) to direct you to the web search service. Please consider using the search to help us keep creating apps. If you do accept, you may still delete the search icon, bookmark and homepage easily. Thanks for understanding. As standard, there is an Ad-Free version available for a small fee. These guitar chord basics won't replace proper lessons, but will help you teach yourself the chords you need to play for to get started. These chords are suitable for classical, acoustic and electric guitar playing.

This 3D side scrolling game is inspired from retro 8-bit Circus Charlie game. Play this game and refresh your those old good time childhood memories. Jump through the varieties obstacles that are coming on your way until you finish the level. It has rich circus environment with live audience who are encouraging you to finish the level. Jump through fire-rings, spikes, rolling drum, deadly pendulum, hurdle bar and so on. Walk upon burning ropes without getting burned and much more. Refresh your old 8-bit memories with this brand new Circus Charlie 3D game and it's totally free. Enjoy the PC/Console level advance graphics features such as HDR(High Dynamic Rendering), Real-time shadows and more in your high-end mobile devices. What are you waiting for? Download it now!!! GRAPHICS FEATURES ============== ★ 3D Graphics Environment ★ Real-time Shadows ★ HDR (High Dynamic Rendering) effect ★ Anti-aliasing filtering GAME FEATURES =============== ★ Refreshing Circus Charlie Music ★ Immersed and Thrilling Game Play. ★ Unique Obstacle in Every Level. ★ Hard-core mode (No level checkpoints) More levels coming soon! Please rate the game and give your suggestion (if any). On giving less than 4 star, please write the reason, so we can improve the game accordingly.

description: Football fans will love the beauty, speed, and simplicity of the 2014 Pro Football Schedule in Football Schedule 2014. The quick loading interface and attractive layout not only provide easy access to the full schedule, you can also choose your favorite team and highlight important matchups, offering quick access to your most important games. Let us know what you'd like to see! Football Schedule 2014 includes matchups for all 32 Pro Football Teams including: Arizona, Atlanta, Baltimore, Buffalo, Carolina, Chicago, Cincinnati, Cleveland, Dallas, Denver, Detroit, Green Bay, Houston, Indianapolis, Jacksonville, Kansas City, Miami, Minnesota, New England, New Orleans, New York (NYG), New York (NYJ), Oakland, Philadelphia, Pittsburgh, San Diego, Seattle, San Francisco, St. Louis, Tampa Bay, Tennessee, and Washington. Football Schedule 2014 was created by Neverstill Mobile, a division of Neverstill Media, LLC, and is in no way affiliated with the National Football League (NFL) or their partners.

description: En İyi Mobil Uygulama Ödüllü Cepyol (Turizm Teknolojileri Zirvesi 2013), otel, uçak, araç kiralama, otobüs biletleri ve artık İdo biletlerini cebinize getiriyor. İstanbul Deniz Otobüsleri tarihinde ilk defa cep uygulamasından kullanıcıları ile buluşuyor. Cepyol yurtiçi ucak bileti, yurtdışı uçak bileti, ido bileti ve otobüs biletlerini kolayca alabileceğiniz, otel rezervasyonu yapabileceğiniz ve araç kiralama yapabileceğiniz son derece pratik bir mobil uygulamadır. Arama sonucunda tüm otelleri, araçları, ido seferlerinin biletlerini, havayolları ve otobüs şirketlerinin biletlerini tek bir ekranda detaylıca karşılaştırarak sunan, en uygun veya en ucuz bileti bulmanızı sağlayan kişisel seyahat acentanızdır. Uçak Bileti : Türk Hava Yolları (THY), Anadolu Jet, Sun Express ve Atlas Jet dahil yurtiçi ve yurtdışından 800’ün uzerinde hava yolları firması ile dünyanın her yerine yapılan uçak seferleri ni, en iyi fiyatlardan bulmanızı sağlayan Cepyol, var olan tüm uçak seferlerini karşılaştırarak, en çeşitli uçuş seçeneklerinin arasından uçak bileti nizi en hesaplı ve kolay yoldan almanızı sağlar. Türk Hava Yolları, AnadoluJet, Atlasjet, SunExpress, KLM, Lufthansa, Delta, Qatar, Air France, Olympic Air, Alitalia, Royal Air, Condor, British, Aerosvit, Emirates, Etihad, Gulf Air gibi 800 ü aşkın hava yolları firması ve uçak seferleri ile uçak bileti sorgulama ve satın alma hizmeti vermektedir. Otobüs Bileti : Cepyol üzerinden Metro, Varan, Ulusoy, Anadolu Ulaşim, Efe Tur ile birlikte 70 in üzerinde otobüs firmaları ndan Turkiyenin heryerine tüm otobus seferleri ni karşılaştırabilir, otobüs bileti nizi ve oturacağınız koltuğu seçebilir ve hemen satın alabilirsiniz. Seyahat sırasında tatilinizi kesmeden yeni gezi ve turları değerlendirebilir, tatil fırsatları nı karşılaştırabilir. İstanbul Deniz Otobüsleri ( İdo ) : Tarihinde ilk defa İdo'nun tüm seferlerine cepden ulaşabilir, araçlı yada araçsız biletinizi sırada beklemeden, koltuk seçiminizi kendiniz yaparak alabilirsiniz. İdo'dan bilet alırken yer kalmaması yada İdo bileti satan acente bulamama gibi problemlerden maruz kalmazsınız. Otel Rezervasyon : Türkiyede ve Dünya çapında 20.000 şehirde, dilediğiniz lokasyona göre 250.000'in üzerinde her yerdeki oteller i karşılaştırabilir, en uygun fiyatlarla dilediğiniz otel de rezervasyon yapabilirsiniz. Otel rezervasyon seçeneğini seçip, otelleri ni görmek istediğiniz şehiri ve tarihi yazmanız yeterli. Karşınıza çıkan oteller karşılaştırma sayfasından otelinizi fiyata, hizmetlerine ve puanlamasına göre seçebilir, böylelikle hotel rezervasyonunuzu tamamlayabilirsiniz. Araç Kiralama : Cepyol, 71 il ve 700'den fazla lokasyonda 7000 den fazla araç ile yüzlerce araç kiralama ( car rental ) firmasının rekabet halinde olduğu bir araç kiralama ağı olduğundan, "rent a car" firmaları kiralık araç larını en uygun fiyatlarda sunmaktadırlar, bu nedenle kiralayacağınız kiralık oto piyasadaki en iyi fiyatdan kiralamış olursunuz. Kiralık araçlar en fazla 3 yaşındo olup kiralayacağınız arabanın ( rental car ) model yılını ekranda görebilirsiniz. Tedarikçilerimiz Rentoquality adını verdiğimiz kalite testlerimizi başarıyla geçtiklerinden dolayı, oto kiralamada en kaliteli hizmeti alırsınız. Sefer Bilgileri : “Uçuş Bilgileri” butonu ile havalimanlarına iniş, kalkış ve gecikme bilgileri ile tüm uçuşları izleyebilir, “Şehir Hatları Vapurları" butonu ile İstanbul sehir hatları vapur seferleri bilgilerini iskele ve sefer saatlerine göre alabilirsiniz. Cepyol seyahatinizi sorun olmaktan çıkartır, ister iş gezisi ister tatil gezileri olsun, çıkacağınız yolculuğa dair en uygun çözümleri ve en ucuz biletleri cebinize ulaştırır. Kampanyalı uçak seferlerinden, kampanyalı İdo seferlerinden, kampanyalı otobüs seferlerinden, kampanyalı otel konaklamalarından ve kiralık araçlardan haberdar eder. Cepyol bir Cepyol Com Turizm Pazarlama ve Yayıncılık A.Ş. markasıdır.
release_text: v3.03 * İdo'da bazı seferlere bilet alırken yaşanan problemler giderildi * Tespit edilen eksikler giderildi v3.02 * Otel rezervasyon sistemi yenilendi * Otel satın alma seçeneklerine taksit eklendi * Tasarım ve kullanım iyileştirmeleri yapıldı * Tespit edilen eksikler giderildi

description: Cogs is a ground-breaking puzzle game where players build increasingly complex machines using sliding tiles in 2D and 3D environments. It comes with 50 puzzles and three gameplay modes for a total of 150 unique challenges, totalling more than 10 hours of mind-bending gameplay. This award-winning game is perfect for puzzle fans of any age and ability! ***If you receive a "graphics format unsupported" error, please email us! If you are using Chainfire3D, please set it to support PVR or uninstall it to play Cogs*** “It is awesome.” – TouchArcade "One of the highest quality puzzle games we've seen." – PocketGamer “The visual design and imagination of the game are stunning, with great attention to detail, and the sound effects are downright enticing.” – Adrenaline Vault “If a sliding puzzle was a wheel, consider it re-invented!” – TouchGen “A masterpiece visually, as well with the actual gameplay.” – AppAdvice INVENTOR MODE Starting with simple puzzles, players are introduced to the widgets that are used to build machines — gears, pipes, balloons, chimes, hammers, wheels, props, and more. TIME CHALLENGE MODE If you finish a puzzle in Inventor Mode, it will be unlocked here. This time, it will take fewer moves to reach a solution, but you only have 30 seconds to find it. MOVE CHALLENGE MODE Take your time and plan ahead. Every click counts when you only get ten moves to find a solution. LEADERBOARD AND ACHIEVEMENTS THROUGH OPENFEINT Unlock achievements, see how you stack up on global leaderboards, and play with friends! The "discover known accounts" permission is used by OpenFeint to pre-fill the email address field if the user opts to set up a new OpenFeint account. Cogs does not have in-game ads.
release_text: Google Game Services now available! **** If you receive a "graphics format unsupported" error, please email us! If you are using Chainfire3D, please set it to support PVR or uninstall it to play Cogs **** Asus Transformer tablet users: please reboot your tablet if Cogs crashes.

description: ☆ ☆ ☆ ENGLISH GRAMMAR PREMIUM (Grammar now in my pocket) ☆ ☆ ☆ ** NO ADS, FREE UPDATES, ENJOY FULL VERSION ** ☆ ☆ ☆ GRAMMAR PREMIUM IS NOW WITH GRAMMAR PRACTICE ☆ ☆ ☆ Grammar is the study of words and the ways words work together. An invisible force that guides us as we put words together into sentences. Any person who communicates using a particular language is consciously or unconsciously aware of the grammar of that language. To speak in a clearer and more effective manner we study grammar. A person who has unconscious knowledge of grammar may be sufficient for simple language use, but the ones who wish to communicate in an artful manner and well, will seek greater depth of understanding and proficiency that the study of grammar provides. This android application will help to improve your English grammar. Keep this application always in your pocket. give us feedback and join our English grammar communities for more updates. Version 1.0 ☆☆☆New Topics ☆☆☆ ✪✪Spoken English✪✪ ✪✪Tenses✪✪ ✪Question Tags ✪Reported Speech ✪Trial Questions ✪Use of Let ✪Use Of Little, A Little, Few, A Few ✪Use of Shall ✪Use of Should ✪Use of Wish ✪Used to ✪Using of Must or Have To ✪Verbs ✪Phrases ✪Plurals ✪Practice1 ✪Prepositions ✪Pronouns ✪Punctuation Marks ✪Quantifiers ✪ Active Or Passive Voice ✪ Adjectives ✪ Adverbs ✪ Articles ✪ Auxiliary Verbs ✪ Capitalization ✪ Grammar Mistakes ✪ Conditionals ✪ Conjunctions ✪ Degree of comparison ✪ Determiners ✪ Direct & indirect speech ✪ English phonetics ✪ Essay Writing ✪ Figure of speech ✪ Gender ✪ Gerund and present participles ✪ Going to ✪ Had better ✪ Homonyms ✪ Idioms ✪ Independent & Dependent Clauses ✪ Infinitives ✪ Interjections ✪ Irregular verbs ✪ Nouns STUDY ENGLISH GRAMMAR n PRACTICE

WeMo app controls the WeMo Switch, WeMo Light Switch and WeMo Motion. Turn electronics on or off from anywhere. Control your room lighting from your smartphone. Motion Control your electronics. Compatible with Android phones or tablets running Android 4.0 and higher. Introducing WeMo. Belkin’s WeMo system is a family of simple, ingenious products that use your Android phone or tablet and your home Wi-Fi® network to connect you to the things and people you love. WeMo is your home at your fingertips. WeMo can control just about anything. With WeMo you can turn on your lights from another room, or turn it off from across town. You can put your home on a schedule—living room lights go on at Sunset, kids’ TV goes off at bedtime. You can check to make sure you turned the iron off, after you’ve already left. The Complete WeMo System. The WeMo App runs on your Android device and controls any electronic device you plug into a WeMo Switch—if you can plug it in, you can turn it on or off with WeMo. The WeMo Light Switch replaces your existing light switch and allows you to control a whole rooms lights from anywhere. WeMo Motion lets you control the devices when motion is detected. Have the floor lamp go on when you enter the living room, and turn off when you leave. WeMo Switch, WeMo Light Switch and WeMo Motion are available at major retailers. The WeMo family of products is great at automating repetitive tasks, and at allowing you to control your household in ways you’d never thought possible. The beauty of WeMo is it’s completely modular. You can control as much or as little of your home as you like. Control one light, one room, or the whole house. WeMo is your home at your fingertips. Check out the WeMo community at http://community.wemo.is Key Features • Control electronics from anywhere on Wi-Fi and 3G/4G networks (remote access) • Easy Setup with customizable WeMo device names. • Simple to create rules help you automate tasks and keep your home safe. • IFTTT integration lets you experiments with a world of online Apps. • Multi-Language Support • Devices easily update to make sure you get the latest features.
release_text: • Fixed critical issue that prevented app launch on Android 5 (Lollipop) For the best WeMo experience, please make sure all phones/devices have the latest app. Feedback? Tell us what you think at wemohelp@belkin.com.

Ultimate Blacklist is a communication tool for anyone who uses phone calls, sms or mms that helps people be productive and do not be disturb by marketing or unwanted calls, sms or mms. Protect your privacy and block undesired calls, SMS or MMS with Ultimate Blacklist which represent flexible call blocker, SMS, MMS filter! It will save you from unwanted calls, unwanted text messages and marketing numbers. Ultimate Blacklist allows you to create and manage black list of unwanted contacts and block their calls and sms. You can add numbers to the black list in various ways: - directly enter number, - choose number from your contacts, - recent calls or messages Ultimate Blacklist provide various block modes. Its includes: - Block blacklist, except whitelist - Block only blacklist - Block all phone activity, except whitelist - Block all phone activity, except number is in contact book - Block all phone activity, except number is in whitelist or contact book. What is more, Ultimate Blacklist supports non-numerical numbers which are often used in spam SMS or MMS! You can just disable non-numerical numbers and sms and mms would be blocked immediately. The great news are that if you add this number to white list you can still view it. When SMS, MMS or call is blocked you can either get a notification or make Blacklist to work in silent mode. Choose which way is most convenient for you! Ultimate Blacklist have a backup to save all your settings and logs and protect them from being lost. You can transfer your settings over all your devices easily, or just send it to email and view in any worksheet application such as Microsoft Excel. Also application have a "Silence time" feature, this means you can create time intervals to not disturb you and Ultimate Blacklist would block all phone activity in this time. In case when you would not want to anyone view you history, Ultimate Blacklist have a password protection to protect you privacy. Post your issues: https://bitbucket.org/sagens/blocker/issues
release_text: - Backup user settings feature - Send history to email - Clear history - No first beap anymore - Bugfixing

description: You are a 'Fu' the Panda and you need to use your ancient martial arts skills to defeat all your enemies! To control Fu, touch the corners of the screen and he'll jump in the appropriate direction. Using this technique, take out the enemies scattered around the environment. Successfully defeat all enemies and you'll move onto the next level! Tap with both fingers to zoom out to see where you need to be heading. Featuring… Simple, but addicting gameplay Lots of levels of increasing difficult Great music an sound effects Pandas and Kung Fu!

Fetch the Dead Of The Day, from thousands of concerts made available on the Internet Archive by the Grateful Dead and their fans. The Dead Of The Day app provides a simple interface to stream music from the most extensive collection of live recordings ever assembled. At the push of a button, the app selects and streams a song from a concert played on the current date, week, or month from among the band's 30 years of touring. The simple media player interface displays the concert venue, date, and song title, and lets you navigate through the music - pause and restart playback, skip or repeat songs, go to the start or end of a concert. You can set concert search preferences according to your taste - choose crystal-clear soundboard feeds or rowdy audience recordings, select from your favorite years and decades, pick a random song or listen to an entire concert. And save your favorites for repeated enjoyment. Whether you're a die-hard Deadhead or just discovering the Dead, you're sure to enjoy thousands of hours of the best live music ever recorded. Have you had your Dead Of The Day?
release_text: New features in version 1.3: - Reduced gaps between songs when playing in continuous mode - Resizable text in concert info area using standard two-finger pinch/stretch gesture

description: مرحبا بك إلى أسماك حُلمي، إنّك على بعد نقرات قليلة فقط من امتلاك أحواض متعددة للأسماك حيث يمكنك أن تقوم بتربية الأسماك التي تريدها وبيعها وجعلها تتكاثر! قم بتربية سمكة المهرج الصغيرة الجميلة ، أطعمها لتراها تكبر، وزين أحواضك بالنباتات الاستوائية الغريبة وشعاب البحر المرجانية. إنّها لعبة سهلة وبسيطة كسهولة العدّ من واحد إلى ثلاثة. (ولكن لا تنس تنظيف أحواضك!) ولكن على ماذا تحصل عندما تجعل الأسماك تتكاثر؟ سمكة الضربة + سمكة المهرج = ؟ سمكة البيرانا + سمكة صفراء ذات أنف طويل = ؟ سمكة تنين البحر الورقية + سمكة الزعانف ذات العلم = ؟ الميزات : * مئات من الكائنات البحرية الغريبة بما في ذلك الحيتان القاتلة وأسماك القرش والأسماك ذات الأشعة اللادغة * إشتر سمكتك وأطعمها وأحبها وبعها واجعلها تنمو لتكتسب خبرة. * اجعل الأسماك تتكاثر كما تحب وللحصول على نقود إضافية. * يمكنك امتلاك حتى 80 حوض، والارتقاء ضمن 80 مستوى. * عشرات من الخلفيات بما فيها الاطلانتس وستونهينج مجانا! * مئات من الزينة والنباتات: الأعشاب البحرية والكهوف وحوريات البحر والسفن الغارقة والحصون! * قم بزيارة وتنظيف أحواض صديقك حتى يرتفع مستواك وتصبح "مميز" في أحواض الجيران.

Hangman is a classic guessing game.The COMPUTER thinks of a word from the selected category and you should try to guess it by suggesting letters. If the suggested letter does not occur in the word, the COMPUTER draws one element of the hangman. The game is over when: The PLAYER completes the word The COMPUTER completes the diagram: Openfeint added as global scoring system.Your score will be submitted automatically when you win.Also you can unlock Achievements when you have certain amount of points. NEW!! 10 Leaderboards added for each category. There are several categories available in this version. -Basic English -World Countries -Animals -Flowers -Sports -Family Members -Body Parts -Names -Family -Clothes -Fruits and Vegetables Try and enjoy it ! Test your knowledge!
release_text: More common words in Basic English added.

description: Aces Bubble Popper Pop! Pop! Pop! Enjoy a classic bubble pop game with a twist. Aces Bubble Popper includes three different game modes for tons of bubble popping fun! Attempt to burst all the bubbles in the Classic mode or race the clock to pop the required number of bubbles with the Timed mode. For a truly unique experience try Super Action mode with specials, like bubble swap and bubble gum, to clear bubbles even faster. Become an expert at all three of the mini-games in the Super Action mode to gain even more points and earn a place at the top for the online leaderboards! Game Features: • 3 different game types: Classic, Timed, and Super Action. • Easy, Medium, and Hard difficulties! • Specials to earn extra points and pass levels faster. • Fun and challenging mini-games in Super Action mode. • Additional bubble colors on higher levels. • Online Leaderboards: personal, daily, weekly and overall. • Tracks tons of statistics! Permissions requested and how they are used: • Full Internet Access: This permission is used to: 1) link to our website, 2) link to social networking like Twitter and Facebook, 3) update leaderboards, 4) collect gameplay data that we use to improve our games, and 5) allow ad networks that advertise within the app. • View Network State: This permission is used primarily to check for a network connection before attempting to connect to our website. • Modify/delete USB storage Contents Modify/delete SD Card Contents: This permission allows the app to access game data saved on an external storage device. • Read Phone State and Identity: This permission allows the app to establish a unique ID for our leaderboards that can be used across all of our applications. • View Wi-Fi State: This permission allows the app to establish a unique ID for our leaderboards for tablets that do not have telephone information. • Control Vibrator: This permission is used to access vibration functionality on the device. • Automatically start at boot: This permission is used for push notifications, users can turn push notifications off in the marketing inbox. More games from Concrete Software: PBA Bowling Challenge Jellyflop! Aces Spades Wordsplosion Aces Gin Rummy Aces Hearts Aces Traffic Pack Aces Jewel Hunt

This app takes English input and translates it to Circular Gallifreyan. You can then share the converted text with others as well as export it to a generic image file. A great app for all Doctor Who fans. Circular Gallifreyan contains some letters with lines extending from them. These lines point in random directions which will change every time the letter is redrawn (which includes when you rotate the screen). The lines are supposed to move around. Only the number of lines is important to the translation.
release_text: Version 1.9 - Added share as jpg option - Added export to gallery - Added set background image for translation

description: 1、计算依据：各城市人力资源和社会保障局最新公布的社会保险缴纳所占工资比例及上下限额、各城市住房公积金管理中最新公布的公积金缴纳所占比例及上下限额、《中华人民共和国个人所得税法实施条例》。 2、本工资计算器目前已采集上海、北京、广州、深圳四城市2010年一般职工个人缴纳社会保险、住房公积金所占工资比例数据，其它城市职工请自行设置比例；此外，该四城市职工可能因缴纳的保险类别不同导致个人承担的保险比例不同以及公积金缴纳比例不同，请自行调整比例设置。 3、本工资计算器会及时根据政府最新公布的数据进行调整，并根据用户需求逐渐补充其它城市的数据。 4、您有任何疑问或建议请联系： 最新的到手工资计算器，由专业的人力资源专家为您打造。 1 输入税前工资，工资计算器自动显示个人应缴纳的各项社会保险、公积金及个人所得税，点击计算得出到手工资额。 2 各项费用的比例可以使用标准设置，也可以自行设置。 3 本工资计算器依据政府最新公布的数据设置比例及限额，目前已采集上海、北京、广州、深圳四城市2010年数据，数据会根据政府规定实时更新。 4 使用了各城市人力资源和社会保障局最新公布的社会保险缴纳所占工资比例及上下限额。 5 使用了各城市住房公积金管理中心最新公布的公积金缴纳所占比例及上下限额。 6 可以分别计算2011年9月1日税改前后的收入。 v1.02更新 根据上海最新平均工资的更新进行了修改。 同时，加入了苏州，杭州，南京等城市。
release_text: v1.03更新 加入2011年9月1日后税改后计算模式。

[ 주요 기능 ] - SMS와 MMS로 오는 은행과 카드사 문자 자동 입력 기능 - 지출, 수입내역 입력 기능 - 지출, 수입내역 검색 기능 - 주별, 월별, 연별 예산 설정 기능 - 다양하고 강력한 통계, 차트 기능 [ 지원하는 기타 기능 ] - 구글 드라이브를 통한 데이터의 클라우드 백업, 복구 기능 - 다양한 색의 테마 선택 기능 - 비밀번호 설정 기능 - 엑셀 파일 내보내기 기능 [ 권한이 필요한 이유 ] - RECEIVE_SMS : 수신된 신용카드나 은행의 SMS를 읽어 가계부에 자동으로 등록 해 주기 위해 필요합니다. - RECEIVE_MMS : 수신된 신용카드나 은행의 MMS를 읽어 가계부에 자동으로 등록 해 주기 위해 필요합니다.

Getting started is easy! Simply download our FREE Mobile Banking App, then login using your current Online Banking login information to access your Central Bank accounts. With our Mobile Banking App you can: – Easily access your Central Bank accounts from anywhere – Check your account balances – View recent and pending transactions – Transfer funds to or from your Central Bank account(s) – Pay bills from your Central Bank checking account – Find Central Bank locations and ATMs in Minnesota, Wisconsin and Florida Central Bank takes the security of your personal and financial information very seriously. We use industry standard security standards to maintain the highest-level of security for your private information, that way you can use Central Bank’s mobile banking App with confidence to access your bank accounts securely, from anywhere. Central Bank is based in Stillwater, MN and proudly serves communities in the Twin Cities Metropolitan area of Minnesota and Western Wisconsin and Southwest Florida. Learn more at: www.centralbnk.com

필수어플 - 배터리스토커(배터리정보 표시) 배터리스토커(BatteryStalker) '배터리스토커'는 강력하고 가벼운 배터리 관리 프로그램입니다. 배터리스토커는 간단한 사용방법을 통해, 배터리의 정보를 알기 쉽게 표시합니다. 누구나 배터리스토커를 사용해 알림(Notification)을 통해 배터리 정보를 확인 할 수 있습니다. 배터리스토커의 가장 큰 장점은 메모리를 차지하지 않는다는 것입니다. 알람매니저를 사용해 배터리정보를 갱신하고 바로 종료됨으로써 메모리를 효율적으로 사용합니다. 또한 배터리 소비에 대한 부분을 해소함으로써 다른 배터리 어플과의 차별성을 강조합니다. 특이사항 - 베가 시리즈에서 배터리 온도가 제대로 표시되지 않을 수 있습니다. - 갤럭시S 시리즈에서 메모리정리(램정리)시 강제 종료될 수 있습니다. 이 경우를 대처하기 위해선 여러가지 작업이 필요하고, 처리를 한다면 굉장히 무거운 어플이 될 수 있기에 처리하지 않습니다. - 일부 스마트폰에서 배터리사용량 확인이 안될 수 있습니다. 1. 배터리 잔량(Battery level) - 배터리스토커는 배터리의 잔량을 아이콘과 함께 알림에 표시합니다. - 배터리스토커는 배터리의 잔량에 따라 다른색의 배터리 이미지를 보여줍니다. 2. 배터리 상태(Battery status) 배터리 상태는 아래와 같이 표시됩니다. - 알수없는(BATTERY_STATUS_UNKNOWN) - 충전중인(BATTERY_STATUS_CHARGING) - 방전중인(BATTERY_STATUS_DISCHARGING) - 충전정지(BATTERY_STATUS_NOT_CHARGING) - 완전 충전(BATTERY_STATUS_FULL) 3. 배터리 헬스(Battery health : 배터리 건강 상태) 배터리 헬스는 아래와 같이 표시됩니다. - 알수없음(BATTERY_HEALTH_UNKNOWN) - 알수없음(BATTERY_HEALTH_UNSPECIFIED_FAILURE) - 상태좋음(BATTERY_HEALTH_GOOD) - 과열상태(BATTERY_HEALTH_OVERHEAT) - 배터리불량(BATTERY_HEALTH_DEAD) - 과전압상태(BATTERY_HEALTH_OVER_VOLTAGE) 4. 배터리 잔량 - 배터리 잔량은 0~100까지 각 상태에 맞는 색의 배터리와 함께 알림(Status bar : 상태바)에 표시됩니다. 5. 배터리의 상태가 변경된 시간 - 충전, 방전등 배터리의 상태가 변할때, 상태가 변한 시간을 보여줍니다. ＃배터리스토커 사용방법＃ 1. 배터리스토커 어플리케이션을 실행합니다. 2. [배터리 알림 사용하기] 버튼을 누르면 배터리 표시가 유지됩니다. 3. [배터리 알림 종료하기] 버튼을 누르면 배터리스토커 사용이 종료됩니다. 4. [배터리 알림주기 설정하기] 버튼을 누르면, 배터리의 정보를 새로고침하는 시간을 설정할 수 있습니다. - 30초, 1분, 3분, 5분, 10분 5. 오류신고 및 문의메일은 [배터리스토커 개발자정보]를 통해서 보낼 수 있습니다. - 관련 검색어 - 어플스토커, 배터리스토커, croute battery, notification, 상태바 어플 - 2011.03.12 - V1.0.0 등록 - 2011.03.22 - v1.0.1 갤럭시S 등의 폰에서 충전중이라고 뜨던 상태 수정 - 2011.03.23 - v1.1.0 알림 아이콘 수정 : 좀 더 큰 숫자 사용 오류신고 메일 : 디바이스정보와 어플리케이션 버전 추가 알림 클릭 : 알림 클릭시 어플리케이션 실행 - 2011.05.24 - v.1.2.0 갤럭시S, 갤럭시S2 에서 램관리시 꺼지는 부분 수정 배터리 사용량 확인하기 메뉴 추가 USB, 데이터케이블을 사용하지 않고 배터리만 변경했을 때, 상태변경시간이 갱신되지 않는 부분 수정 - 2011.06.08 - v.1.2.5 배터리 정보 데이터 새로고침 호출 로직 수정 - 가끔 상태바에서 아이콘 사라지는 문제 수정 - 2011.06.12 - v.1.2.6 : Downgrade 확인되지 않은 오류로 인해 다운그레이드합니다. - 2011.06.17 - v.1.2.7 : Update 새로고침 오류 수정 버전입니다. - 2011.09.14 - v.1.3.1 : Update UI 디자인 변경 21~23% 아이콘 사라지는 버그 수정 - 2011.09.30 - v.1.3.2 : fix version 갤럭시S 및 갤럭시S2 애플리케이션 작동 멈춤 버그 픽스. - 2012.03.27 - v.1.4.0 : Update 갤럭시S2 기반의 ICS(아이스크림 샌드위치) 테스트 완료 Essential Apps - Battery Stalker (Battery information display) Battery Stalker (BatteryStalker) 'Battery Stalker' is a powerful, lightweight, battery-management program. Through the simple use of a stalker battery, the battery display information clearly. Anyone using a battery stalker alert (Notification) and you can check the battery information. The main advantage of battery stalker is that it does not take up memory. Using Alarm Manager to update the information immediately shut down the battery so that the efficient use of memory. In addition, the section on battery consumption by eliminating the other battery applications and emphasizes the distinction. Uniqueness - The temperature of the battery in the Vega series can not display correctly. - Clean up the Galaxy S series of memory (RAM cleanup) when forcing shutdown. In this case you need to deal with the various work instantly, and the process would be very heavy itgie application does not handle this. - Some smart phones may be disabled, check the battery usage. 1 remaining battery (Battery level) - Battery stalker with the power of the battery icon displayed in the notification. - Depending on the battery level, the battery stalker is battery shows images of different colors. 2 Battery Status (Battery status) The battery status is displayed as shown below. - Unknown (BATTERY_STATUS_UNKNOWN) - Charging (BATTERY_STATUS_CHARGING) - Is being discharged (BATTERY_STATUS_DISCHARGING) - Charge Stop (BATTERY_STATUS_NOT_CHARGING) - Fully charge (BATTERY_STATUS_FULL) 3 Battery health (Battery health: health of the battery) Battery health is displayed as shown below. - Unknown (BATTERY_HEALTH_UNKNOWN) - Unknown (BATTERY_HEALTH_UNSPECIFIED_FAILURE) - Fine (BATTERY_HEALTH_GOOD) - An over-temperature condition (BATTERY_HEALTH_OVERHEAT) - Battery failure (BATTERY_HEALTH_DEAD) - Overvoltage condition (BATTERY_HEALTH_OVER_VOLTAGE) 4 remaining battery - Battery level is from 0 to 100 for each color of the battery with the correct status notification (Status bar: The status bar) to be displayed. 3.5. Battery's state was changed - Charge, discharge lamp batteries are byeonhalttae, shows the time has changed state. How to use battery # stalker # 1 Run the battery stalker application. 2 - Using the Battery Notification] button to display the battery will be maintained. 3 - Battery Notification quit] button to end the use of battery stalker. 4 - Battery notification period setting] button is pressed, to refresh the battery, you can set the time.   - 30 seconds, 1 minute, 3 minutes, 5 minutes, 10 minutes 5 Error reporting and inquiry email to [battery Stalker developer Information can be sent through. - Related searches - Applications stalker, stalker battery, croute battery, notification, status bar application - 03/12/2011 - Registration V1.0.0 - 22/03/2011 - v1.0.1 Jungyirago phones such as the Galaxy S tteudeon state charge modification - 23/03/2011 - v1.1.0 Notification icons EDIT: Using a larger number of Report an error Mail: add device information and application versions Click the notification: Notification when application is running, click - 24/05/2011 - v.1.2.0 Galaxy S, Galaxy S2 off part of managing the RAM modified Check the battery usage menu additions USB, without using a data cable, but when changing the battery, the state does not change the time to update (edit) - 06/08/2011 - v.1.2.5 Modify data refresh battery information call logic - Fixed occasional disappearing icons in the status bar - 06/12/2011 - v.1.2.6: Downgrade Unchecked downgrade due to an error. - 17/06/2011 - v.1.2.7: Update Modified version of refresh failure. - 14/09/2011 - v.1.3.1: Update UI design changes 21-23% icons disappearing bug fixes - 30/09/2011 - v.1.3.2: fix version Galaxy S and Galaxy S2 applications stop working bug fixes. - 27/03/2012 - v.1.4.0: Update Based on the Galaxy S2 ICS (Ice Cream Sandwich) tested

description: A white/cyan global theme for Smart Launcher. To use it, open smart launcher, enter in the preferences, select Personalizzation, then Global theme. Tag: GSLTHEME

Our previous game "Nail Doctor" still continues to dominate all the kids games. It was an excellent game which becoming very popular surgery games and kids like to play it. So, we are coming here another excellent surgery game concept called "Hand Surgery". Kids will get funny experience through this game and also get some basic surgery tips of hand. In short kids will learn with fun. Main features of the game: => Injection is used to be done in pill form, or through it => Shower is used to remove clay or any dust from injury. => Dryer is used to suck the water and kill small germs by its warm air. => Germs killer is used to kill the germs with animating way with attractive sound => Pus remover is used to remove pus. => Cotton is used to remove a blood and remove wounds. => Ice is used for remove swelling => X- ray is used to scan your toe. => Painkiller-Spay is used to relief from toe pain. => Colorful and funky bandage for your injury. => Cream facility for saving your toe and nail from infection. => Plaster is used to recover your Toe to be as before injury and the funny thing in it is you can do colorful paint over the plaster. So, download this heart throbbing kids game free and make your child happy.

Turn your lovely photo into beautiful collage! Are you in love? We are happy to propose our best photo collage maker app for all romantic feelings and sweet couples! Create your love story using this fantastic app! Make photo memories with you and your beloved unforgettable! Wanna surprise your sweetheart at St. Valentine's day? Our new collection of Valentine's Day romantic frames, stickers and emoticons is perfect for lovers, for couples, and for all people, who cherish the wonderful feeling of love! Happy Valentine's Day! Your inspiration, like your love, really have no limits with Love Photo Collage Maker photo editor! Let the beautiful photo stories and picture collages make you and your beloved happy and joyful every day! You haven't be a guru in photography and photoshop photo editing for creating your future masterpiece because our photo editor is extremely easy to use and offers a lot of features to stitch your pics and make them look awesome! Express your love and passion to somebody by creating love photocollage about your feelings: you can use nice frames, cute stickers, add text about your love, choose font that you like, add "I love you" & "Heart" emoticons and send it your passion! Create a love card with various love quotes like "I love you", "Te amo", etc. It will be a nice surprise for your beloved! It's so easy to do - just choose a photo frame you like as a base for your love card, choose a font and color, then add love quotes and, finally, send this amazing love card to your beloved via SMS, WhatsApp, E-mail or share via Facebook, Instagram, Twitter! This is how you can create your personal love cards with love quotes that will become a nice present for your beloved! ★ Tons of photo frames ★ Collage frames ★ Photo grids ★ Effects (sepia, lomo, 70's, 80's filters & more) ★ Stickers, emoticons & cliparts ★ Photo editing functions (mirror image, crop, rotate, brightness/contrast/sharpness adjustments & more) ★ Text on the photo ★ Easy sharing via Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, SMS, E-mail, WhatsApp ★ Totally free ★
release_text: Free photo frames, collages, grids and amazing features!

description: Play piano on your smartphone. It comes with single and double piano keyboard, 6 octaves per keyboard and different sound banks. Sounds are a studio quality and they are taken from a real piano. You can use it for learning, showing lessons or you can record your play. Piano can now record your music in MIDI format so you can play it on PC!

Данет_ка - это игра в которой вам будут задаваться вопросы на которые вам нужно отвечать нажимая кнопки "Да" или "Нет". Докажите своему сопернику что вы умнее его с помощью этой игры! Отвечайте на вопросы быстрее и правильнее чем ваш соперник! Соперником может быть друг, брат, жена, муж, сестра, мать, отец да хоть сосед, не важно главное что бы вас было двое! В каждом турнире по 10 вопросов и по 10 секунд на ответ, тот кто первый ответит на вопрос верно получает бал и соответственно тот кто наберет больше балов выигрывает. Danet_ka - a game in which you will be asked questions that you need to respond by pressing the "Yes" or "No". Prove your opponent that you are smarter than he is with this game! Answer questions quickly and correctly than your opponent! Opponent can be a friend, brother, wife, husband, sister, mother, father, neighbor, but at least it does not matter the main thing that you had two! Each tournament 10 questions and 10 seconds to answer the first one who answer the question correctly gets the ball and therefore the one who will score more balls wins.
release_text: Убрал страшный прогресбар, поживем без него Изменил вид финишной сцены

description: With Voice&Calendar you can insert events into the calendar using your voice and everyday language. “Meeting tomorrow at 18”, “Every Monday and Friday gym from 18 until 19”, “5 May, 19 March and 5 April Workshop at half past ten”, “Call the doctor in 10 days at 9“ these are only some examples of phrases that can be parsed by Voice&Calendar. You can specify date, time, title, event location, event description, repeating events and add also a reminder: “For 2 weeks antibiotic every day at 20 Reminder 5”. If you don’t want use the voice you can also type the sentence. No more tedious filling of fields for event details, with Voice&Calendar add new events in the calendar is simple and fast. Furthermore with Voice&Calendar you can show the events of a specific day simply speaking “Display” and the date you wants see: “display today”, “display April 2”, “display 2015 August 8”, “Display the last Sunday of May” Available language : English, Italian

CalRoads app provides current road information for California highways. The information includes Caltrans road restrictions, such as snow chain control, and CHP road incidents, such as accidents and road debris. This app translates CHP abbreviations. For incidents that provide a location, CalRoads can display a map of the incident location. The location is likely less accurate for incidents with estimated (Est.) LatLong.
release_text: New features: 1) CHP incident data now includes latitude and longitude for all of California except for 3 urban areas: Bay Area, Los Angeles and San Diego. 2) Now handles new codes for 3 dispatch centers: Monterey, Stockton and Capitol. 3) Fixed two minor bugs

description: Japanese Lessons is provided by NHK WORLD. In each lesson, you can learn a useful expression through an audio drama. By the time you reach the end of the series, you will have mastered 50 handy expressions! Cuong, the main character in the drama, is a 25-year-old Vietnamese. He was working for an affiliated company of a Japanese electrical appliances manufacturer in Vietnam. After being assigned to the company's headquarters in Tokyo, he came to Japan for the first time. Although he's been studying at a Japanese language school in Vietnam, he's worried whether his language ability is good enough. His colleagues at the Tokyo Headquarters of ABC Electric are waiting to welcome him. By using NHK WORLD's Japanese Lessons, you can learn how to speak Japanese readily and conveniently. Start learning how to speak Japanese online for free!
release_text: Support Chinese, English, French, Indonesian, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Thai, Vietnamese

description: The cutest game on social networks comes to your mobile device! - No Internet connection required! Play wherever and whenever you want! - Play in English, German, Spanish or Russian! - Regular updates! Unique content added with each and every one of them! - Discover more than 150 magic plants and trees. Plant, tend and harvest your way to the heights of arcane wisdom - Tame 100 cute animals including Unicorns, Peacocks and Dragons - Use sophisticated equipment to brew potions and carry out alchemical experiments - Decorate your farm with numerous enchanted items - Get ready for a lot of interesting quests and achievements Install the game now and take ownership of your own Fairy Farm! Visit our game group ( http://on.fb.me/IL5vJQ ) to learn about latest news, sales and announcements. Copyright (c) 2011-2014 Startek Invest Limited
release_text: Prepare for st. Patrick's celebration - New unique irish animals, collect them all; - New adventure, prepare your farm for st. Patrick's day! - Friend visiting becomes more comfortable, check it now!

description: It's the last minute of the game and your opponent has the ball.. but he's lost it! What a chance to score .. you take it, shoot... GOOOOOOAAAAAALLLLL! Yes you can have this amazing experience with this Soccer Air Hockey with simple gameplay and great physics, Soccer Air Hockey is easy to pick up and fun to play! In true competitive style, challenge your opponents for table soccer matches! Compete in different tiers, from different players! You can also customize your Soccer Stars experience by collecting the different teams! Show off your style and demolished your opponent! KEY FEATURES: - Offline multiplayer game - Simple and fun gameplay - Amazing ball physics - Play against your friends - Simple controls over drag What are you waiting for? Everyone else is already playing Soccer Air Hockey! Don't miss out on this chance to have tons of fun!

The Forbes News app brings the latest news articles from the Forbes website right to your Android Phone. The articles feature the latest trends in finance, marketing, technology, communications, science, law, investing and entertainment. You can read the articles in the application's browser or you can read them in your own browser(if you have network issues). If you like the articles and you want to share it with you friends, you can long click the list and share it on your social networks, through text message and through email. You can add the articles that you want to read again to favourites. You can manage your favourites by long clicking the items. You can add up to 50 favourites. Forbes News app is for the people. If you have any suggestions or you want a new feature to be added, please do mail us. We really appreciate your feedback. Supports all screen sizes, i.e phones, 7 inch tablets and 10 inch tablets. If you have any problems in getting images or the page not loading properly. Kindly try it on another network. ***Sorry for the trouble caused to all the users. The fix is taking long because none of the users that rated the app bad, have submitted a crash report. The next version will be coming in a couple of weeks with the issue resolved. Thanks for the patience, and sorry for the inconvenience.*** **Forbes News application is NOT an official application. All the Content in the application is taken from the forbes.com website**

Piste is the place to be. The Rossignol Pursuit iPad application gives you a global overview of the new Ski, Boots, Helmets and Goggles on piste lines. Thanks to simple features (zoom in/out, sliders, videos) you can go through the 2012/2013 product offer and discover every product in detail. The “Rocker Story” page shows the benefits of the new rocker profiles by simply pressing on the skis with your finger. You can also watch the latest innovations in videos. Enter the Rossignol Pursuit world...

Do you have a keen eye for avoiding rapid-fire collisions with hostile aliens? Are you quick with your wrist? Toby is a dimension traveler who got lost in an unknown dimension. And he’ll have you moving constantly as you tilt your screen in all directions. How else are you going to survive as long as you can? Use your reflexes to keep your space saucer away from bombs, spacecraft, jets and alien capsules! You can play as actively or as passively as you want: • If you’re a daredevil, dodge the space saucer to boost your score. • If you’re a scaredy-cat, just avoid your enemies from a distance. But you can’t run from everything. Power-ups and coins within this unknown dimension increase your chances of survival, improve your score and ensure you’ll get to the next mission. Acquire them during game play by safely intercepting as many as you can. Coins help you buy power-ups in the store for your next mission. And power-ups give you special advantages. They include … • Slowing time for 5 seconds (now it’s easier to avoid enemies) • Activating a shield for 5 seconds (now you can smash the aliens you used to run from), and • Gifting you extra lives too! See how high you can climb by completing each challenging and tilt-crazy mission. Each finished mission earns you extra resources, medals and trophies!

★★★★★ "I was able to find my dream home faster and with less stress." ★★★★★ "Makes house hunting so much easier and fun!" ★★★★★ "It shows all the information you need right in your fingertips" Finding homes for sale or apartments for rent has never been so easy. Trulia’s top-rated real estate app instantly shows you a map of nearby homes for sale, open houses, or apartments for rent. With our simple-to-use filters, you can find real estate listings that match your specific search criteria. And with Trulia’s boards you can save, narrow, and share your favorite homes with friends, family, or by yourself. You can easily browse basic real estate info, detailed listings, and open house info for homes for sale or rent across the US. Plus, you’ll get vivid photo slideshows of homes and rentals, real-time notifications about homes and properties you've saved, instant alerts when nearby homes hit the market, and local neighborhood info. Now optimized for your tablet and Android Wear, the Trulia Real Estate App lets you keep up with your house hunt wherever you go. “One of the best Android apps for finding a house to buy, place to rent or to simply browse local real estate information." – Best Android Apps Review Stay on top of your real estate search with the Trulia. Note: Real Estate & Homes by Trulia only provides listings in the US at this time. Key Features: ✓NEW! Boards: the simple way to organize, narrow, and share your favorite homes. ✓ Instant Maps: Using built-in GPS, see nearby homes for sale, apartments for rent or recently sold homes, ✓ Nearby Home Alerts: Get instantly alerted when homes near your current location hit the market. ✓ Android Wear compatibility: get nearby home alerts, view property details and photos, or contact the agent — all from your watch. ✓ Open Houses: Find open homes for sale near you, and easily add them to your calendar. ✓ Custom Searches: Add search filters like price, lot size, number of beds, neighborhood, and more. ✓ Keyword Searches: Search for listings using keywords or MLS numbers. ✓ Photo slideshows: View slideshows of homes, condos, townhomes, apartments and more. ✓ Instant Updates: Get notified immediately when new home listings come up in your favorite areas or there are status updates to your saved homes. ✓ Local Scoop: See school attendance zones and nearby amenities like restaurants, grocery stores, gas stations and more. ✓ Crime Maps: See a crime map of any neighborhood in the US. ✓ Map Modes: View a map area in normal, satellite or terrain mode. ✓ Mortgage Calculator: Get personalized rates and calculate your mortgage. ✓ Cross-device Access: Log in to access your favorite searches and properties across all your devices. ✓ Connect w/Agents: Quickly contact relevant real estate agents about listings. ✓ Directions: Get directions to open houses, homes for sale, or apartments for rent. ✓ Trulia Widget: See new homes for sale, right from your home screen. ✓ Samsung Air View: Hover your finger - or S-pen - on a property listing to see property details (only available on Samsung GALAXY Note I, Note II, Note 8.0 and 10.1, and Samsung GALAXY S4). We'd love to hear your feedback! Email us anytime: android@trulia.com
release_text: With this release, you’ll notice one big change—the addition of boards. They’re the simple way to organize, narrow, and share your favorite homes. You can also team up with your friends, family, or agent on a board. We’ve also made it drop-dead-simple to call an agent from the app—it only takes a tap. But, you’ll need to allow us to access your phone. As always, keep the feedback coming! Email us anytime at android@trulia.com.

description: Collection of quotes and sayings sent by app users! Share your favorite quote, rate and comment on quotes shared by members of the Waluu community. ★★★ First social application on Quotes ★★★ You will love this social app exclusively focused on quotes. More than 200,000 members worldwide have already joined us! Enjoy the wisdom of Chinese proverbs, poetic Indian quotes and deep Buddhist philosophy, not to mention your own creations! ✓ Browse all community quotes ✓ Share them on Facebook and Twitter ✓ Vote and comment on each quote and saying ✓ Add friends and easily find their quotes ✓ Search by quote category or keyword ★ Quote Categories ★ Quote categories: ✓ Saying / Sayings : Quote / Quotes ✓ Love quote, life quote, friendship, and passion quotes ✓ Motivational quote and quote of the day ✓ Entrepreneur and personal development guru quote ✓ Happiness quotes ✓ Rhyming phrases, poems, poetry and slam ✓ Speaking (related speech /discourse) ✓ Chinese proverb, American proverb, African proverb, Spanish proverb, Italian proverb, Japanese proverb, Mexican proverb, Canadian proverb, French proverb etc. ★ The best quotes from the application ★ "Remind yourself that it’s ok not to be perfect." "Yesterday and tomorrow do not exist. So live your life today." "Love is an irresistible desire to be irresistibly desired." "Don’t wait for perfect moment take the moment and make it perfect." "Don’t judge me by my PAST. I’m not in the past anymore. Accept me for who I am because this is me TODAY." "I don’t go crazy. I am crazy. I just go normal from time to time." "Good friends are like stars. You don’t always see them, but you know they’re always there." "LEARN from yesterday. LIVE for today. HOPE for tomorrow." "If you can’t fly, then run. If you can’t run, then walk. if you can’t walk, then crawl. But whatever you do, keep moving." - Dr. Martin Luther King JR. "One day you’ll love me, the way I loved you. One day you’ll think of me the way I thought of you. One day you’ll cry for me, the way I cried for you. One day you’ll want me, but I won’t want you." "Forget your past, whether simple or compound, and participate in your present so that your future can be more than perfect <33" "We do not measure the love of a person by the desire to sleep with her but by the pleasure of sleeping by her side." "Many people appear bright until they reveal their stupidity. This is so because the speed of light is greater than that of sound." "Be the wife of one man, the princess of your father, the pride of your brother and the succession of your mother." ★ Definition ★ The word quote designates the action of quoting: ✓ In Literature, quote refers to the reproduction of a short extract from a prior speech or writing in a text or in some form of oral expression. ✓ In the legal domain, quote is synonymous with "notification" or "meaning". Likewise, the right to brief quotation is an exception to copyright. ✓ In the military domain, a quote is the honorable commendation of an exemplary act. In the US, according to the extent of the action rewarded, an honorable commendation is given in the Army order; a minor action in a division or unit order. ★ Sample quote ★ "It is good to read books of quotations because quotations, as they imprint in our memory, lead to good thoughts." - Winston Churchill "Challenge Accepted!" - Barney Stinson "To build up high, you have to dig deep." "Finally, it is better to fight than to be afraid." "You laugh at me because I'm different but I laugh at you because you're all the same." "Just a little patience ... And all will go wrong." "10 liter of sweat are far better than 1 liter of blood." "We must take risks, we must always take risks. There is also risk in waiting." "It is not necessary to hope to undertake, nor to succeed to persevere."

description: "ABC balloons" is a great app to help your baby learn to pronounce and visually identify the alphabet. Below are some of the benefits of “ABC balloons” for your baby: - Have fun learning ABC. - Identify special designed ABC letters from balloons. - Play and learn letters at the same time. - Learn and sing the ABC song. Features: • Repeat the letter name by clicking on the letter image • Click on the arrows to advance ABC letters forward or backwards • Play guessing the letter • Great graphics • Original music • No in-app purchases

It is a Widget! It is NOT shown in your application launcher. LATEST UPDATE: FIX FOR not updating anymore bug! description: Com esta aplicação pode consultar o dicionário de português do projecto Wiktionary sem precisar de ter acesso à internet. Da primeira vez que executar a aplicação irá fazer download de um ficheiro contendo o dicionário. Mais tarde poderá actualiza-lo para uma versão mais recente a medida que novas contribuições são feitas na versão online do dicionário em pt.wiktionary.org. Escreva o início da palavra que quer consultar para ver a definição. Também pode procurar todas as entradas que sigam um dado padrão. Por exemplo "i%ção" para palavras começadas com "i" e terminadas em "ção". Tal como o projecto Wikipedia, esta aplicação é livre e não tem publicidade. O código fonte está disponível no site. With this application you can consult the dictionary of the Portuguese Wiktionary project without having access to the internet. The first time you run the application will download a file containing the dictionary. Later you can upgrade it to a newer version as new contributions are made to the online version of the dictionary pt.wiktionary.org. Write the beginning of the word you want to check to see the definition. You can also search for all entries that follow a given pattern. For example "i% ing" to words beginning with "i" and ending with "ing". As the Wikipedia project, this application is free and has no advertising. The source code is available on site.
release_text: Esta versão substitui a versão da semana passada que tinha um problema de actualizaçoões. Este problema afectava os utilizadores que tinham a versão antiga do Wiktionary Português Offline instalado. Texto mais legivel. Palavras favoritas. Actualizações frequentes do dicionário. Permite continuar a usar a aplicação enquanto actualiza o dicionário.

description: •• Fongo is the only calling + texting app that is truly FREE and UNLIMITED. •• •• Save hundreds of dollars per year. •• The evolution of Dell Voice. WHAT YOU GET WITH FONGO • FREE LOCAL CANADIAN phone number • FREE unlimited calling across Canada and to any Fongo number anywhere in the world -- without using any cell minutes* • FREE unlimited incoming calls and incoming SMS text messages • FREE unlimited Fongo texting, including group and picture messaging anywhere in the world* • Travelling outside of Canada? Call back to Canada for FREE* • FREE premium features like visual voicemail, caller ID, call waiting and call forwarding • Cheap international calls • Turn your Android Tablet into a phone • Sync with your existing contacts and Facebook friends • English, French and Chinese language support • Fongo even supports 911 emergency calls* HOW WE'RE DIFFERENT • UNLIMITED - No need to buy or "earn" additional minutes and texts by watching videos, downloading other apps or filling out surveys • LOCAL PHONE NUMBERS - Free local Canadian phone numbers so your friends and the pizza guy can call you back, without having to pay for long distance • CALL ANYONE - Any number: landline or mobile, domestic or international • 911 - Support for 911 emergency calls, a CRTC requirement in Canada, and an additional option for reaching out in case of emergency* VALUE ADD-ONS Fongo is 100% FREE and does not require any purchase. Purchase cellular text messaging (SMS) and long distance credits to save even more. HOW WE MAKE FONGO FREE Fongo is disrupting the mobile communications world with one simple concept: Free. We make use of advances in technology, an innovative business model and word-of-mouth marketing, and pass the savings on to you (so tell your friends!). Our revenue comes from optional add-on features, pre-paid worldwide calling credits, and in-app ads. FONGO IS NEW Hundreds of thousands of Canadians are already using our mobile service. And we're growing incredibly fast as more and more people discover they no longer have to pay expensive mobile phone bills. You don't need to cancel your current mobile contract to try Fongo, just add the free app to your phone and start calling and messaging for free. You be the judge. USE FONGO OUTSIDE OF CANADA If you're travelling abroad, avoid expensive long-distance and data roaming charges by connecting to WiFi before using Fongo to call or message. Once you're connected to WiFi, call back to any of our Free Calling Cities, or call and message other Fongo users, for free. From anywhere in the world. FONGO DATA USAGE When you're connected on a call, Fongo uses 0.5MB of data per minute so a 500MB data plan = 1000 minutes of talk time. If you're calling on WiFi, you can pretty much talk forever. When you're not on a call, Fongo uses a minimal amount of data to listen for incoming calls. IMPORTANT • Supported devices: Supports Android (OS 2.2 and higher) • To use Fongo you must be connected to a 3G, 4G or WiFi data connection and you must create a Fongo account. If your data signal strength is weak or your connection speed is slow, this app may not function properly. • If you disable notifications, you will not receive incoming calls. • Questions or need help configuring your device? Tap Support on the Account screen. • Have an idea how to improve Fongo? Tap Feedback on the Account screen. • Using Fongo as a default dialer may interfere with dialing 911 emergency services. WEB www.fongo.com m.fongo.com @Fongo_Mobile www.facebook.com/fongomobile *Fongo uses WiFi or your data plan to make and receive calls and send and receive messages. Data and international data roaming charges may apply. See www.fongo.com/calling/free/ for a complete list of Free Calling Cities. 911 terms and limitations can be found at www.fongo.com/legal/911/.

description: パパの為の妊娠週刊カレンダーです。 出産予定日を入力すると、 毎週ママの気持ちがちょこっとだけ分かります。 ----------------------- このアプリを作成した動機は、 嫁さんの妊娠です。 妊娠に関するHPやアプリを色々調査したのですが、医学的な難しい言葉や画像がちょっとわかりずらく、 馴染めず、嫁さんの妊娠を気にはしていますが、妊娠に関する知識を学ぶ気持ちに踏み込めていませんでした。 それなら自分でアホみたいなのでもいいので、感覚的にわかりやすい、変なイラストや文章をつけて、 自己満足なものでいいので作成してみようと思い、自分の妊娠への勉強も兼ねてこのアプリ作成に取り組んでみました。 実際、色んなことをこのアプリ作成を通じて学びましたので、奥様の妊娠を控えているお父さんの中で興味をもたれた方がおりましたら、 妊娠の知識への最初の第一歩にでも、もし宜しければご利用いただけると幸いです。 ----------------------- 留意事項: ※iphoneアプリからの移植しています。現在移植途中ですので差が多少あるかと思いますが、ご了承の程よろしくお願いいたします。 妙な文章やイラストは私が独断で作成した箇所がございますので、半信半疑で読み進めていただければ感謝です。 文章や画像はパンパース様のHPを見本にさせて頂き編集しております。何か問題等ございましたら、 rc@real-creative.jp までご一報頂けましたら嬉しいです。 変更履歴: 2011/11/19 ■週数を正式な計算方法、予定日を40週0日に修正しました。 (chiaki様、mirimint様ご指摘ありがとうございます!) 2011/11/30 ■着床した予想日付や何ヶ月目かを表記するようにしました。 計算方法は妊娠予定日から280日(40週分{40x7=280})さかのぼった日付になります。嫁さんが詳細にいつ妊娠したかを知りたかった為に追加。 2011/12/10 ■妊娠0週0日目を最終月経開始日に修正しました。 (日付の計算方法を着床と混合して考えてしまっており、ご迷惑をおかけしてしまい申し訳ありませんでした。(^^)様、どうでめぇ様、ぴろーき様、アドバイス有難うございます!) ■*ヶ月目を修正しました。 (どうでめぇ様ご指摘ありがとうございます) ■ツイッター検索を各週に追加しました。 妊娠中のリアルタイムなユーザさんの声を聞く事ができます。 2012/1/7 ■分娩タイトルマッチ特別号を追加。 (分娩に関する情報「開口期、娩出期、後産期」を追加) 2012/1/12 ■出産予定日、及び、本日の日付、に曜日を追加 (嫁さんに予定日の曜日を何度きかれても忘れていたので追加) 2012/1/25 ■鼻毛大名の城下町番外編を追加。 (妊娠時期に便利なアイテムを紹介する情報です) 2012/2/10 ■パンパース様に問題が無いか問い合わせ中です。 chi-y-miki, suta530様、ご指摘ありがとうございますorz。おっしゃる通りです。2012/12/5に問い合わせメールを行い返信待ちです。2012/2/12にアプリをダウンロードできなくする対応を実施して、次期アップデートには全ての画像、文字を見直す予定を立てております。 2012/2/12 ■ダウンロード停止 2012/3/20 ■画像/文章の大幅なリニューアルを実施しました。ダウンロードを再開しました。 ／／公式サポートHP http://papadesu.jp/ikuji/info.html
release_text: この度は妊娠週刊パパのご利用ありがとうございます！ 今回のアップでは以下修正を行っています。 ①トップページにアイコン広告を追加させていただきました。 ※告知：現在このアプリの姉妹アプリとして「育児週刊パパ」を作成中です。 そのアプリのAndroid化が完了次第こちらの広告にてご連絡させて頂きますので どうかご了承の程よろしくお願いいたします。 変な箇所での追加処理ですので、嫌な気持ちにさせてしまっていたら スイマセン。。。より良いアプリとして改善していけたらと思っております。 よろしくお願いいたします。

description: A masterpiece of logic games, Picross, also called Illustration Logic, Nonogram, Griddlers, Hanjie. Now users can compete with one another!! Let’s have a fight and enjoy! You can check your rank through weekly ranking and total ranking. ** Game Rules 1. You have blocks to find continuously as many as the numbers on the row and column. 2. If there are more than two numbers on one line, you should find blanks as many as the numbers, and there are more than one bomb between the numbers. ** Single Game * Normal Mode(15*15 ~ 30*30) : New logics such as numbers, special characters, tangrams, color, etc. are continuously added. * Big Mode(60*60 ~ ) : Try experiencing about 30,000 square logics : New logics are continuously added. ** Competition Game Two types of 10*10 and 10*12 are provided randomly, and the one who clears the stage first wins. If you click bombs for three consecutive times, then you will lose. ** Main Functions - Handle everything with dragging - Completed vertical and horizontal lines are displayed as ‘complete’ automatically.

description: Make your telephone or tablet speak to you with Voxygen’s Best-of-Vox Voices. The Becool voice reads aloud any French text. Get rid of flat voices with no expression or personality! Discover Natural and Fun Voices, and listen to a sample here: http://www.best-of-vox.com/android . Follow us on Twitter http://twitter.com/VoxygenSAS to keep up with new voices! Like us on Facebook http://www.facebook.com/voxygen.fr ★ What is it for? Various ways to use Best-of-Vox voices: voice guidance, E-books and SMS reading, ring tones, alarm clocks, Android accessibility features with Talkback and much more. Share your messages from the Best-of-Vox application on your preferred social networks: SoundCloud, WhatsApp, Skype, hubiC, Evernote, Drive, etc. ★ How does it work? The Best-of-Vox application allows you to type or paste text and to have it read out aloud by the voice that you have chosen. You can then save it as a ringtone or share it with your friends on SoundCloud ! From your emails, your Internet browser, or any compatible application, select some text and make your Best-of-Vox voice read it aloud by simply clicking on the “share” menu. ★ How to install it? Only 2 clicks to activate the Best-of-Vox voice in the Android settings that you reach from the application's main menu. Watch the installation video and follow the instructions. Please note: with Android versions prior to 4.0, one additional first click is required at the bottom of the settings list in order to activate the voice. ★ How to fix an occasional problem? – Cannot hear the Best-of-Vox: First ensure that the volume of your device is sufficient. If this is the case, than it may be that the voice's data was corrupted during or after its installation. In order to reinitiate the voice, please perform the following steps: go to “Android Settings / Applications / Manage applications / Best-of-Vox voice”, click on “Force stop”, click on “Clear data”, return to the home screen, ensure that the device is connected to a Wi-Fi network (which is required to download the data), restart the Best-of-Vox application, wait for the download and data preparation to be fully completed, enter some text and click on the “play” button. Questions? Please contact android@voxygen.fr . Credits: Moteur de synthèse vocale / Voix de synthèse / Synthèse vocale / Speech synthesis / TTS / tts / Text To Speech / Texttospeech / Speech synthesis engine / TTS engine / Synthetic voice / TTS voice : http://www.best-of-vox.com/android
