Discovery Education's® WebMATH website http://webmath.com is a math-help website that generates answers to specific math questions and problems, as entered by users. Math answers are generated and displayed in real-time. In addition to the answers, Discovery Education's® WebMATH website shows users how to arrive at the answers to the math problem(s) they enter. Disclaimer ========== Apps4Android's "IDEAL Web Math" suite of accessible "mobile browsers" were conceived of, developed, and are supported by IDEAL Group, Inc. and Apps4Android, Inc. Neither IDEAL Group, Inc., Apps4Android, Inc. nor its suite of accessible mobile browsers are affiliated, in any manner, with Discovery Education®. Objectives ========== The objectives for developing accessible, customized, mobile browsers are to: 1. Accommodate the technology access needs of tens-of-millions of students with print disabilities who may have difficulty accessing and using standard websites. They do this by making standard websites less complex and easier to access and use; and, 2. Provide disadvantaged students, who do not have the luxury of having home-based PCs connected to the Internet, with mobile-friendly “ports-of-entry” to standard websites. Credits ======= We would like to thank: 1. Discovery Education® for their thought-leadership in developing and offering, free-of-charge, their wonderful WebMATH website http://webmath.com resources to anyone wishing to access them; and, 2. The Rehabilitation Engineering Research Center for Wireless Technologies (Wireless RERC), sponsored by the National Institute on Disability and Rehabilitation Research (NIDRR) of the U.S. Department of Education (under grant number H133E110002) for supporting IDEAL Group's and Apps4Android’s efforts to make standard educational websites accessible, usable, and useful to all students… including students with a wide range of print disabilities! This mobile browser is limited to accessing the following functions of Discovery Education's® WebMATH website http://webmath.com resources: Simplifying Expressions ======================= * Involving Exponents/Powers * Involving Products of Terms * Involving Like Terms * Simplify any Expression Polynomials =========== * Add/Subtract * Divide * Multiply * Raise to a Power * Complete the Square Factoring Polynomials ===================== * Greatest Common Factor * Difference between Two Squares * Trinomials Solving Linear Equations ======================== * Involving One Variable * Involving Two Variables * Find Numerical Solution Solving Quadratic Equations =========================== * By Factoring * Using the Quadratic Formula Radical Expressions =================== * Simplify Square Root term * Simplify Any Root Term Complex Numbers =============== * Calculate Power of i * Add Two Numbers * Subtract Two Numbers * Multiply Two Numbers * Perform any Operation Inequalities ============ * Solve an Inequality * Plot an Inequality Word Problems (Percents) ======================== * X is Y% of what number? * X is what percent of Y? * What percent of X is Y? * What is X% of Y? * What percentage difference is the number X from the number Y?
release_text: Added Tablet Friendly layout design! Improved the performance ! Upgraded to support latest Android features with Actions bars!

description: An electric locomotive is a locomotive powered by electricity from overhead lines, a third rail or an on-board energy storage device (such as a chemical battery or fuel cell). Electrically propelled locomotives with on-board fuelled prime movers, such as diesel engines or gas turbines, are classed as diesel-electric or gas turbine-electric locomotives because the electric generator/motor combination only serves as a power transmission system. Electricity is used to eliminate smoke and take advantage of the high efficiency of electric motors; however, the cost of railway electrification means that usually only heavily used lines can be electrified.

description: In this game you have to clean and care the animals from our favorite zoo. More animals need care, and you're the perfect doctor to help them and to make visitors happier. First you must choose which animal to start, lion, bear or zebra. After choosing the animal must wash it, of course that you will do after you've given the animal an injection of anesthetic in order not to hurt you. Must apply a layer of shampoo after which we will wash very well, to clean the skin and moisturize. Still need to get the animal in the treatment room where we will eliminate all wounds and we clean them. We need to clean up all the blood from his body and then eliminate all the bumps and bruises on the head, hands and feet. Then you must extract them all thorns and all those that have entered the body, putting them on a tray to throw them afterwards. Still need to dress if you want to look better for visitors to come to come to the zoo. Please try other games for girls in this category to see if you're doing as well as you did until now to improve your gaming skills in child care. Instructions: Use your fingers to play

This is English - Albanian and Albanian - English Dictionary (Fjalor Anglisht - Shqip dhe Shqip - Anglisht), containing 57000 translation articles. The Dictionary is OFFLINE and does not need the internet connection. Database size is more than 6MB. It will be downloaded when the application is run first time. We recommend you to use Wi-Fi connection. Main features: 1. History – every word you ever viewed is stored in history. 2. Favorites – you are able to add words to favorites list by clicking the “star” icon. 3. Managing History and Favorites lists – you are able edit those lists or clear them. 4. Various Settings – you may change application’s font and theme (choose one of several color themes). 5. Word spelling, using Text-To-Speech module (requires internet connection). Powered by iSpeech®. 6. Context word search – click any word in translation article and search for it’s translation. 7. Random word of the day widget. To see the widget in the list the application must be installed to phone memory (dictionary database may be installed anywhere). This app contains advertising.
release_text: Bugfixes. Interface localization to many languaes. Google +1 button. Fix for search field for left-to-right languages.

description: This version is only for tablets with 7" or higher and a minimum resolution of 1024x600. Tactical Futsal is the ultimate experience to improve your tactical knowledge and the best way to apply this knowledge to the sport you love. With our software, specially developed and designed for Futsal coaches is now possible to create, save and load dynamic plays, set balls and prepare training exercises. You are free to move your players around on the screen and draw all the plays using your fingertip. This app also allows to create, save and load unlimited plays, animated or not animated, the choice is yours. Features -User friendly -Lightweight (doesn't slow your tablet or desktop) -Colored lines -Full court or half court -Just press play and show your animated tactical sequences -High quality graphics -Improves the communication between player and team's staff -Substitution manager -Create, save and load your own plays Taking advantage of the best tools that technology has to offer, we created an application that allows the coaching staff to save all the information about the team, the players, and the way that the team plays, yet also allows us to save all the information about our opponents and the way they play. This software can improve the way that the information is transmitted during the game, and also how this information is managed after the game. This software is available in 6 languages (English, Spanish, Portuguese, French, Italian and German).

If you are starting to learn French, or want to extend your knowledge of the language the Collins French Dictionary is the ideal book to help you understand and communicate. The dictionary has over 80,000 references, contemporary vocabulary, cultural equivalents, and notes on dialect. It is ideal if you're conducting business with French-speaking customers or colleagues. With Collins, you can trust each translation is correct. The Foremost Authority on the Language of Today  • Over 80,000 words, phrases and translations  • Comprehensive and up-to- date coverage of all words and phrases you need, and French updated for the new spelling reform  • In-depth treatment of difficult words  • Cultural notes provide insight into the life in French-speaking countries Words are tools for life. And a Collins Dictionary makes them work for you. A SEARCH TOOL featuring search autocomplete to help you find words quickly by displaying predictions similar to the terms you're typing. You also get enhanced search extras including:  • A quick search of words while you type.  • A 'fuzzy filter' for when you are not sure of the correct spelling of a word.  • A 'keyword' search for finding key words within compound words.  • A wild card search function ('*' or '?') which can replace a letter or entire parts of a word.  • Download dictionary definitions locally for offline word lookup. A LEARNING TOOL including a number of features that help you further enhance your vocabulary:  • A 'Favorites' feature to create custom folders with lists of words from the extensive library, including cross-curriculum words.  • History list to help you easily review looked-up words.  • Discover more using the included special language notes.  • See words in context with example sentences.  • 'Word-of-the-day' feature with dedicated homescreen widget.

Stunning fully 3d fantasy medieval environment with amazing castle with crispy realistic look will fill your phone with fantastic colors! 8 different cameras will allow you to explore world easily and produce countless angles of views! Now with real world time of a day lighting and real sky! Also additional customization settings available. Do not rely on screenshots, you have to download it to understand the real 3D impact! description: *** GetMe2 Adelaide has reached the end of its life, please see the new and fully featured GetMe2 Transit. Full trip planner, timetables stored on your device, easier to use and real time transit in selected locations! *** -Ad supported version, limits number of favourite routes/trips that can be saved- GetMe2 Adelaide is designed to get you from where you are to where you want to go, all using the public transport system available to you! Bus, Train and Tram times are stored on your phone so once you're up and running no Internet connection is required to access times. Some features include: - Stop selection via map (no need to know your stop number) - Point to point allowing selection of a departure and arrival point, the rest of the work will be done for you! - Ability to find stops near your location and display the routes of all services departing these stops - Stop times displayed on the map for each stop - Set an alarm before your service departs/arrives/transfers - Support for service transfers. This means all trip times are displayed, unlike other transport apps that sometimes miss over half of the services available - Journey planner with customisable transfer time links multiple services so you can make your connections - Show alternate services between selected stops - Street address for every stop listed - Favourite routes with customisable names - Include nearby stops with customisable search radius. i.e. include all stops within 100 metres of the selected stops for your trip - Filter services by transport type (bus/train/tram) and/or service name - Direction switcher to view services in the opposite direction - Stop filter so stops in the opposite direction aren't displayed - Select how many days in advance to show service times for, or increase search day by day - Show all services frequenting a stop by selecting the stop from the map - Easy to navigate screen flow - Automatically checks for timetable updates - Gesture support for moving between tabs Compatible with tablets although not officially supported at this stage. Enjoy!
release_text: v1.201 -New Feature: Set an alarm for a departing/arriving service or a transfer between services -Bug Fix: Timetable updater sometimes crashed when checking for a timetable update if no Internet connection was available, download progress bar incorrectly reported progress -Bug Fix: Further minor bug fixes causing various crashes -Improvement: Even smaller timetable -Improvement: Notification to update timetable when it's out of date. Defaulted auto update check to every three days

description: This is the 'lite' version of JezzBall Classic. If you like it please consider getting the full version. :) -- Over 20 years ago people could first play the original JezzBall. Since then a lot of different versions of it has been created, and although some have been great none of them were really close to the original. JezzBall Classic changes that; it was created to be just like the original! The graphics, the scoring, the physics, the tempo... they are all the same as they were in the original. Some bugs and issues of the original has also been fixed and measurements have been taken to prevent possible cheating. Many optional new features has been implemented as well and the graphics have been greatly improved (though designed to mimic the original style). But the true JezzBall feeling can still be found in JezzBall Classic, and that's what really is important! Gameplay: In JezzBall there are a number of Jezz atoms that bounces around. Your task is to build black walls that contain them in as small space as possible. When over 75% of the playarea is black the current level is completed and you move on to the next where another Jezz atom is added into play. Press down to place the origin of the wall, move to determine the orientation of the wall and release to actually start building the wall. It is constructed in two directions from the center, if a wall-half is hit by a Jezz atom before it has reached an already existing black wall it is destroyed and you lose a life. Features: + The original JezzBall experience! Into the very last detail; if you came looking for the JezzBall you remember you will not be disappointed! + Four profiles (one reserved for guests) with their configurations stored separately. + 500 beautiful background images (real life photos). Go to the "General" config screen to enable it. Will place a random image into the black walls each level. + Automatic saving of all games in progress. Stop and continue whenever you want to! + Local high score lists. In the Hall of Fame your name will last forever and on the three other lists you will see the daily, weekly and monthly high scores. + Level records. All your best statistics are saved on each and every level you complete. Profile records are comparable. + Smart and very customizable controls will help you build your walls exactly where you want them. + 74 mods that once activated changes how the game is played! Use none or pick one/several at the same time in any order. High scores and level records are stored separately for each combination. Some mods will just change the amount of time/lives you have while other will drastically change gameplay (allow you to use two wallbuilders at the same time for example). There are 19 preset mod-combinations provided. + 100 rooms that will stimulate your intellect as well as your ability to time your deployments! There's also 27 missions to inspire you to break your personal bests. If you enjoyed similar games like Qix, Xonix, Barrack or KBounce you will also love JezzBall Classic! It may not be near as well-known as the biggest puzzle games like Tetris but JezzBall stands its ground as one of the most addicting ones. Players of other popular arcade games such as Space Invaders, Asteroids, PacMan, Snake and Arkanoid (Breakout) or even Pong will find JezzBall Classic both challenging and enjoyable. Do you wish to try the game before you buy it? There is a lite version available! Good luck containing those Jezz atoms! (About the Internet permission: JezzBall Classic does not actually use Internet at all right now, the permission is only there because future updates might need it.)
release_text: + Updated the AIR engine + Fixed an issue with room 29

description: 12 of the most popular card games in 1 pack. Includes Klondike, Pyramid, Spider, Clock, Yukon, Canfield, Four Seasons, Sultan's Harem, Idiot's Delight, Golf, Calculation, and Freecell. Each game has custom gameplay options which allow you to play using your favorite variation on the standard rules. Personalize your game with a choice of card fronts, decorative card backs, and beautiful game backgrounds. Astraware Solitaire also includes the fun Golden Trophy Deck awards system - get all 52 awards to collect the Golden Deck and unlock it to play with! ***If you have updated from the old version you can change your settings by selecting the game you want to play, tap on the Settings icon and change the rules to play the way you like! To change card backs and backgrounds use Settings on the main menu!*** ***Droid device users please note! To play in landscape, launch the game in landscape. To play in portrait, launch in portrait. You need to exit the game fully (press the back hard key when on the game Home screen) to allow this to work. This is due to a crash issue on Droid, Droid 2, Droid X etc.***

description: 合成写真が簡単に作れるアプリ。 写真を撮るか、保存されている画像を選んで、あとはテンプレートから好きな画像を選ぶだけ。 簡単・単純操作で、おもしろ合成写真が作れます。 写真編集アプリ「PhotoMix」のフィルタを利用しているので、綺麗な合成写真に仕上がります。 テンプレートは随時追加していきたいと思います。 テンプレートは、通信機能を利用してダウンロードするので、初回起動時にOFFの場合は、テンプレートがありません。 ONにして、再度アプリを起動しなおしてください。 app composite photograph is easy to make. Do you take a picture, select an image that is saved, just pick your favorite image from the template the rest. Easy, simple operation, I can make interesting composite picture. Since filtering is used photo editing app "PhotoMix", and is finished in a beautiful composite photograph. I think I would like to add at any time template. The template is to download by using the communication function, the case is OFF, there is no template for the first start-up. By to ON, please re-launch the app again.

Barney's Super-Dee-Duper Fun Day! Have a Super-Dee-Duper Fun Day with Barney and his dinosaur friends. Play three brand new games with Barney, BJ and Baby Bop. In Wonderful World of Shapes, help BJ find shapes in clouds as they drift by. Make your own cloud shapes by switching to create mode and drawing cloud shapes with your finger. Hungry for a tasty snack? Yummy cookies are fresh out of the oven. Help Baby Bop pick a shape and start decorating in Lookie Lookie, It's A Cookie Cookie. When finished, tap your cookie to take bites until it's all gone! Time to try on some Silly Hats! Barney will ask you to pick out a certain type of hat. Make your choice by dragging the correct hat to Barney’s head and presto… see the hat on Barney. Want to see all types of silly hats? Simply enter create mode and shake or tap to see random hats on Barney.

This is a paid app! 99cents will be requested after downloading. A calculator that can be quickly launched from anywhere with SAO Launcher. Currently only supports 4 functions (+,-,*,/). Great for simple math like calculating tips without fumbling to find the calculator app. And it's themeable too, like the rest of SAO Launcher! The Play Store forces DRM on paid apps, which messes with the extension code. That is why an in app purchase is used instead.

description: If you would like for your child to: * gain knowledge about the surrounding world with interest and joy * learn new words * train memory and logical thinking then without a moment of hesitation download our application! Smarty is exactly for you! The full version will pleasantly surprise you! Because it has: * 12 categories and 12 subjects to learn (fruit, vegetables, birds, fish, animals, clothes, transport, etc.); * 4 built-in mini-games: learning new things, quest (search) – to test the newly acquired knowledge, memory and chain – two games to cultivate logical thinking and knowledge retention; * 2 languages – Russian and English, which can be used to learn a foreign language; * professionally done sound, so your child will have a feeling of each word; pleasant and serene design – all the objects are recognizable and neat! We are looking forward to reading about other valuable features of our game in your positive comments! We have done our best to make the game interesting and beneficial for your child!

An autumn rain is a melancholy and sadness on the gone summer. Drops of rain as little diamonds on red autumn leaves. Autumn Rain live wallpaper is new interactive HQ alive wallpaper - full customization. FREE distribution. Autumn Rain live wallpaper interactive edition is new and enriched - previous versions bugs were fixed. Pleasant and nonintrusive Gallery live wallpaper with an animation theme with the following components: Autumn and Nature, Rain. Animated wallpapers are cool wallpapers with realistic animation. Stylish design choice HD graphics. Top quality Replacement images were selected by designer according to application description. All mode changes pictures are interchangeable-look for it in the settings. Backgrounds are much larger than a run screen - they can be scrolled over desktops in a portrait position. Additional animations change their trajectory when the screen is touched by finger, and in this way implementing an interactivity principle. Filling a workspace with additional animations is also controlled on the application setting menu. Settings the user can remove unnecessary animations-sets the number of "zero" on the screen. Autumn Rain live wallpaper application provides for disabling of additional screen saver. Press a centre of the screen (see screen) - a sound block will be enabled. Sound intensity is selected in the settings. Sound full disabling is possible. ============================= Autumn Rain live wallpaper application. SETTING ORDER. 1. Upload interactive wallpaper on your device. 2. On your device setting menu find icon Autumn Rain live wallpaper and launch. Autumn Rain live wallpaper - original designer solution. Autumn Rain live wallpaper interactive wallpaper supports using in a horizontal (landscape) layout. Please send us a message with your wishes and problems concerning installation and use of application. Autumn Rain live wallpaper interactive wallpaper is steadily operated by the majority of popular models from major manufacturers.

LightControl is an application for controlling your Philips Hue lighting system. It provides quick manual controls over the single light or a group as well as presets. In addition it will provide alarms, widgets and tasks support as an in-app product. LightControl is designed around the separation of bulbs/groups and colors/moods/color temperature so that any bulb/group can be used with any color/mood/color temperature. Click on the group name and it will open a new view only with the bulbs in this group. In the current version you can create a presets with bulb-mood pairs. So with one click you can set your entire home lights. When you want to change the lights based on time mood, multiple presets can be executed at the same time if they don't have bulbs in common. If bulb in common exist the last activated preset will be the active one. Support of the schedules supplied by Philips Hue and stored on the bridge. Multiple themes in the program, so you can select between light and dark look. In the free version you can control up to 5 lights. If you need more you can unlock it from the menu as an in-app purchase. Enable the automatic updates so you can get all new features when they are released! App tested on: - Nexus One (Android V2.3.7) - Nexus 4 (V4.4) - Nexus 7 (V4.4) - Asus TF-101(V4.2)
release_text: V1.8.2.163 - Added ability to show the state of the bulbs in the icon. This work for bulbs and groups. - Show selected mood in the list when editing the presets. - Fixed the schedule times. - Now the application tries to open only preset or mood import links not all web addresses. - Bug fixes.

Montenegro GuideWithMe is an offline travel guide, which recommends detailed articles around the country in relation to your current location. Developed by travelers and for travelers, GuideWithMe is a rich source of general travel info as well as off the beaten track advice. Get around guides, phrase lists, warnings how to stay safe and healthy, restaurants and hotel recommendations, local costs and taxes, road rules and a variety of other info are carefully stored in one app. Essentially complete articles with multiple hotel and restaurant listings are suggested for Podgorica, Budva, Pljevlja, Tivat and other travel destinations. ­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­ • USE OFFLINE. Save money on roaming fees and refer to the articles even if you are offline and cellular data is not available. • DISCOVER ARTICLES RELATIVE TO YOUR LOCATION. Switch between country, region, city, travel topic articles recommended for your travel destination and current location. Montenegro travel guide contains around 35 articles covering the whole country. • GET RELIABLE INFO. All info comes from wikivoyage project, which is constantly updated by adventurous travelers and aspiring writers. Articles are vividly illustrated with more than 35 well­ chosen pictures and images. • VIEW ON THE MAP. GuideWithMe is based on map data, provided by MAPS.ME, offline maps app. An option to view the place on offline map is offered. ­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­ We are waiting for any advice and feedback about GuideWithMe app. This will help to suit GuideWithMe app to your expectations and tastes. Your reviews and ratings are always welcome. Send them to android@guidewithme.com or leave a feedback in Google Play review section. Check out our travel guides: http://guidewithme.com/ Follow us! Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/guidewithme Google +: http://plus.google.com/+Guidewithme/ Twitter: @GuideWithMe Enjoy your travels! IMPORTANT: The app is available only in the English language.

description: Join players from all around the world in a free game filled with dragons, fantasy, and puzzle action! Experience thrilling, fast-paced puzzle gameplay with strategic RPG-style role management. EASY TO LEARN -- HARD TO MASTER » Drag your finger over Elemental Runes. Link them in the puzzle to trigger magical Rune attacks from your heroes. » Link like-coloured Runes to launch focused attacks or… » Link differently coloured Runes to unleash devastating multi-element Rune attacks. But beware: These will cost you precious Action Points. RECRUIT A PARTY OF HEROES » Discover 220 powerful RPG heroes powered by different Rune types. » Choose wisely: Each hero has a unique role and can launch elemental attacks, but is vulnerable to specific Runes as well. » Power up your favourite heroes and evolve them into new, legendary forms! NEVER FIGHT ALONE » Tower over your foes and slay the dragon with the help of your friends. Recruit them and in turn be their savior in their darkest hour. » Choose your allies wisely, as you need the right kind of hero and their strength to defeat particular foes. » Compare your progress to your friends’ and gain bonuses when completing dungeons together. A FANTASY ADVENTURE » Enjoy the exciting fantasy storyline that takes you through the depths of the dungeons to the top of the dragon tower. » Encounter hero and monster alike as you battle to unravel the mystery of the powerful sleeping dragons. » Master the power of the runes and the dynamics of each party role to free humanity from the Dragon menace. _____________________________________________ For fans of fantasy games, dungeons, dragons, puzzles, RPG adventures and free games of any kind. Find more games on our official site at http://www.gameloft.com Follow Gameloft on Twitter at http://glft.co/GameloftonTwitter or like us on Facebook at http://facebook.com/Gameloft to get more info about all our upcoming titles. Check out our video and game trailers on http://www.youtube.com/Gameloft Discover our blog at http://glft.co/Gameloft_Official_Blog for the inside scoop on everything Gameloft.

Astrological Charts is a professional astrological program for Android, which reports 12 types of astrological charts, contains, besides planets, 6 asteroids and 23 fictitious points, including trans-Neptunian, and several lots. There is a choice of 11 house systems, 20 types of aspect with customizable orbs and database of about 100000 places with specified time zones, so the difference with GMT is determined automatically, besides, you can add new place. The program calculates exact dates of triggering aspects, periods of aspects by orb, moments of sign changes, lunar phases, eclipses,midpoints and planetary hours in menu of main page. There are Tropical and Sidereal zodiac in program. Chart types: - Transit/Natal - Natal + Transit - Synastry - Secondary Progressions (1 day - 1 year) - Zodiacal Directions (1 day - 1°) - Directions for Arcs of the Sun, the Moon or a planet - Profections - Returns (Solar, Lunar) - Lunar Phase - Composite - Middle - Harmonics This is the best Android app for Astrology!

description: Brought to you by Laurier, the No. 1 sanitary protection brand in Singapore. Track your period with this fun, easy-to-use app and never be caught by surprise again! Best of all, you can carry it around with you all the time. COUNTDOWN CALENDAR & NEXT 12 Record your average period days with just a tap of your finger. Plan your beach holidays and other activities around your period by checking your Next 12 estimated period dates. HANDY REMINDERS Tired of being caught unawares when your period arrives? Can’t stand having to borrow pads from your friends or rushing to the convenience store? Say goodbye to such worrisome situations with the timely Reminders function. Set pop up reminders a few days before your expected period start date so you can pop a pad in your bag or avoid wearing light colours. You can also set other reminders on repeat mode. TRACK YOUR SYMPTOMS Experience specific PMS symptoms on certain days of your cycle? Get to know your body better by recording these symptoms in the app.  *NO MORE EMBARRASSING MOMENTS* Periods are personal and goodness knows you’d never want anyone else to chance upon the app and your private information. That’s why we’ve included these thoughtful features to keep prying eyes away: Disguised App Icon: Your first line of defence. After all, having an app on your phone that screams “Period Tracker” isn’t exactly discreet. That’s why our app icon is labelled simply and inconspicuously “P*Log”. Password Protection: Safekeep your intimate information with a password lock. Fun Reminder Code Words: No one wants a huge “Period Coming” alert to pop up when their friends are crowded around their phone watching a video. With our stealthily coded reminders, no one will know what they mean except you. You can also modify the reminder text to anything else you prefer. What’s more, choose from three different app themes to customise the look of your app! PROMOTIONS & FANPAGE Connect to Laurier Singapore’s website and Facebook page! Never miss out on another Laurier promotion with timely push notifications.
release_text: 1) Addition of 2 new themes: ‘Empower Yourself’ & limited edition ‘Rocker Babe’. 2) Customizable avatar: be empowered and create your own avatar in the new themes. 3) Backup past data – you can now back up your data so that it will not be lost even when you change phones. 4) Expansion of moods and symptoms – more moods and symptoms for you to choose from! 5) Invite your friend - you can now send an invite to your friends from Facebook to download this awesome app!

Знаменитая игра "Шляпа" теперь и на Android. Вам больше не нужно готовить клочки бумаги и придумывать слова, все автоматизировано для Вашего удобства. Вместо шляпы, бумаги и секундомера используйте Ваш смартфон. Играйте с друзьями, идеально подходит для посиделок в кафе или для вечеринки. Игра Шляпа разряжает обстановку и помогает растопить лед между старыми друзьями и новыми знакомыми. Правила игры очень просты, игрокам не требуется обладать какими-либо супер способностями. В игре могут участвовать более двух пар игроков. Игрок пытается объяснить слова, которые он "достает" из шляпы, своему напарнику, за определенный промежуток времени. Запрещено использовать прямой перевод, однокоренные слова и указывать на предметы. Побеждает пара, угадавшая наибольшее количество слов. Ключевые особенности приложения: - тонкая настройка игры: количество пар, слов, время на угадывание, звук уведомления - пять уровней сложности игры (сложность слов), от простейшего для новичков до сложнейшего для более опытных игроков - игровая статистика - деление игроков на случайные пары - звуковое оповещение о том, что время для объяснения вышло The famous game "Hat" is now on Android. No longer do you need to cook the scraps of paper and come up with the words, everything is automated for your convenience. Instead of hats, paper and stopwatch use your phone. Play with your friends, ideal for gatherings in cafes or for a party. Game Hat discharges environment and helps to break the ice between old friends and new acquaintances. Game rules are very simple, players do not need to have any super powers. The game can participate more than two pairs of players. The player tries to explain the words that he "gets" out of his hat, his partner for a certain period of time. It is forbidden to use the direct translation, cognates and point to objects. The winning couple, guess the greatest number of words. Key features of the application: - Fine-tuning the game: the number of pairs of words, the time for guessing, notification sound - Five levels of game difficulty (complexity of words), from the simplest to the most complicated for beginners to more experienced players - Game statistics - The division of players into random pairs - Audible warning that the time to explain the left

- Five apps in one: accounting of income and expenses, accounting of debts and loans, planning and insights, currency accounting and conversions, accounting of deposits and savings. - Automatic synchronization through the Dropbox cloud. - Lots of easily customizable reports - Unique planning workflow which allows for making plans and managing them automatically as well as building insights based on the income and expenses for previous periods. - A special workflow system allows you to quickly enter your income and expenses with a simple action through the easiest user experience imaginable. - And much more, including: recovery and backups, CSV import of reports, password protection, customizable settings, unlimited category (group) levels for income and expenses, etc. The Personal Finance app is an efficient tool for accounting, analyzing, tracking and planning your personal budget. Thanks to easy and intuitive user experience of the app, any user from beginner to finance professional will be able to analyze and monitor their budget. The app can work even when you are offline. Supported languages: Deutsch, English, Español, Français, Italiano, Norsk, Português, Русский, 日本語, 한국어, 中文. The accounting workflow for income and expenses allows you to account and analyze money transfers, generate many different reports and charts, and find answers to questions like: how much on average do I spend each month on...? How much did I earn or spend for a certain period? How much money is on my account now? How much did I spend for a certain group of expenses? Which income and expenses is the biggest? Which income and expenses was incurred using my bank card and which with cash? and much more. The planning workflow allows you to enter the expected income and expenses for any date and then view the cash balance forecast for any date. In addition, the planning workflow will help you to automatically get insights on cash balance changes based on the stats of previous periods. You can analyze the balance changes both in table view or in a chart. Based on the planned data, you can also automatically account for your income and expenses. The loans workflow allows for accounting and managing the transactions related to loans that you've received or issued. If you enter the planned repayment date, the workflow will track the days left before repayment and notify you about the overdue loans and by how many days they are overdue. You can also call a borrower or send them a text message directly from the reports on received and issued loans. You can also account for earnings from loan interest. The currency accounting workflow features are as follows: accounting in any currency, automatic and/or manual setting of exchange rates, currency conversions when transferring funds between currencies, analysis of trends in the exchange rates both in a table view or in a chart, as well as comparison of different currency exchange rates using a chart. The savings workflow is designed for the accounting of your deposits, savings for a certain goal, and ordinary savings. When refunding money from savings, you can also apply the interest amount if this money was on deposit. If you make savings for a certain goal, you can keep track of current progress.
release_text: Support BaksheevN@gmail.com - Automatic synchronization through the Dropbox cloud - Now you can upload and download backups through the Dropbox, and also upload CSV reports to the Dropbox cloud. - The mechanism for uploading / downloading data has been improved and optimized.

The award-winning out of this world puzzle-platformer comes to Google Play! Houston, we have a bloblem...SolaRola stars Wiz and Waz, the game’s blob-like gung-ho duo, tasked with bouncing across a number of challenging planets with the ultimate aim of saving the galaxy. SolaRola for Android has been fully redeveloped to offer players brand new cartoon-style graphics and enjoyable, intuitive touch and tilt-based controls. Praise for SolaRola: Launched on Java in 2007, the original SolaRola was critically acclaimed: Pocket Gamer 10/10 - Platinum Award The Guardian 90% - Keith Stuart, "my new favourite mobile game." Key Features: • Challenging planets to explore and survive • Realistic physics-based gameplay • Touch and tilt-based controls More about SolaRola: With each planet inhabited by all manner of enemies and hazards, the player must navigate Wiz and Waz across a number of ill-positioned obstacles including rocks, slime, bombs and trampolines. Both are susceptible to the planets’ gravity, so items must be strategically placed to guide them past the many obstructions and creatures that patrol the environments. As the game progresses, so the creatures get more aggressive, while the addition of volcanic worlds and razor-sharp hazards are a constant threat to the future of blobkind.
release_text: SolaRola just got even more awesome. We’ve added a bunch of new features and tweaks, including: • A whole new planet to explore • 15 new fun packed levels • New and improved sound effects • Updated the controls • Fixed some minor issues Thank you for playing and don’t forget to rate this update

description: Zen Table Tennis: the world's most intense sport. It is a long way from the pick up ping pong matches in the filthy back alleys of Lhasa to the ethereal mountaintop temple of the Ten Thousand Paddles. But here you are, one match from enlightenment. There is just one problem -- an invisible demon who has seemingly mastered the physics of the sport. Well, two can play at that game. Remember the teaching: "Become the ball." Flick the paddle left and right to control return direction and speed. Use the menu to turn sound off and on, set difficulty easy or hard, reset to a new game. Tilt sideways to play in landscape mode. Win or lose, a fortune cookie awaits at the end. This free Lite version plays up to a two point advantage and contains ads. Please buy the full version 'Zen Table Tennis' on Android Market to play 11 point games with many more fortune cookies.

View video from your Milestone XProtect® system from almost anywhere on your smartphone or tablet with Milestone Mobile. With instantaneous access to video from your XProtect surveillance system, Milestone Mobile allows you to view and export incidents, ensure areas are secure and take immediate action. Key features: • Video Push: A feature that allows you to push video from your mobile device’s camera directly into the Milestone solution • Control outputs and events, such as opening and closing doors and switching lights on or off • View, define and create exports • HTTPS support for secure connectivity • View live video from one or multiple cameras • Play back video recordings • Control pan-tilt-zoom cameras • Set up multiple servers and connect to cameras from different sites • Available in twenty-seven languages Supported Milestone product versions and later: XProtect® Corporate 4 XProtect® Expert 2013 XProtect® Enterprise 8 XProtect® Professional 8 XProtect® Express 1 XProtect® Essential 2 XProtect® NVR 1 XProtect® Go 2 The Milestone Husky NVR series Users of Milestone Arcus video surveillance products are also able to use Milestone Mobile (contact Milestone Arcus partners for details on specific application functionality). Setup In order to connect and view cameras from your XProtect system, you must have the latest (free) Milestone Mobile server component installed and configured. If needed, you can download the server component via our website at: www.milestonesys.com/mobile. For your convenience Milestone Mobile includes a free demonstration server to explore the product features. For more information about setup and configuration, a product demonstration video, getting started manual and FAQs please visit www.milestonesys.com.
release_text: Camera Search Easily and quickly finds cameras and views. GPS position in Video Push* Offers the option of associating GPS position with video when using Video Push* *Only available when used together with XProtect® Corporate 2014 and XProtect® Expert 2014. description: Application Manager (App2SD) is a small, simple, convenient and easy to use android app for all kind of users and developers. Application management task can be achieved easily by using this application. There are so many app management relating apps, though Why to choose this one? -because it is simply the best among all, just try it. It is simply the best at what it does! Features ■ Application Management: - A list of installed applications in a single view, "Application Manager" also enables to list system (built-in) apps. - Application's version information - Size information (application size, data size, cache size and total size). It also supports to count app used external (SD card) size for the android 4.0 and above versions. - Application installation date and last update date. - Application search: facility to search application from installed list using app title as search parameter. - Application share: you can share application's Google Play Store link and also send APK via Bluetooth, Email, Message, Whatsapp, Facebook, Twitter etc sharing media. - Auto application notification and list management on new app install and uninstall. Separate refresh option is also available to refresh application list-view. - Application sorting in ascending and descending order by app name, app size, data size, cache size and total size. ■ Batch uninstaller: - Batch app Uninstall: one of the best and easiest feature of this app is batch uninstall. - Uninstall as many as apps together. ■ Movable app notifications: - "Application Manager" notifies you when newly installed application can be moved to the external (SD) card. ■ Import/Export: - Android Apps are in APK format. "Application Manager" makes it easy to import/export APK files. One can install the app by simply running APK file. - Export installed APK to the external (SD) card. Get list of APKS saved on external card on a single click. It helps to backup. - Import exported apps directly from the external (SD) card. It helps to restored backed-up apps. ■ Battery Usage: - See what has been using your battery Disclaimer: App Manager does not intend to copy licensed Apps. Note: * If app uses any of the following features, it cannot be installed on the external storage. * App Widgets, Services, Input Method Engines, Live Wallpapers, Live Folders, Alarm Services, Account Managers, Sync Adapters, Device Administrators. * No Notification Ads - we don't use any notification ads. * Movable feature does not works with devices: Galaxy S3, Note 2, Galaxy Nexus, Tablets
release_text: Version 1.1 * Loading app is faster * Minor bugs fixed * Complied with Google Play new policies

description: Download missing album art for your albums. ✓ One click downloads all your missing album art ✓ Data from LastFM & MusicBrainz ✓ Manual cover load from Gallery ✓ Auto-save to SDCard ✓ Auto-lookup album art when new album is added ✓ Custom search by artist or album ✓ Built in media scanner FORUM Visit the forum for all questions and answers related to Album Art Grabber. http://album-art-grabber.2309410.n4.nabble.com/ PRO VERSION Support development with the ad free pro version of Album Art Grabber :) PERMISSIONS 'Internet' for fetching covers and ads. 'Access Network State' for ads. 'Wake Lock' for 'Auto-lookup for New' preference. 'Write External Storage' for saving album art to SDCard. 'Receive Boot Completed' for 'Auto-lookup for New' preference (will not be used unless preference is checked). INFORMATION • To update your album list use the Media Scanner under preferences. • If album art is not found it can be because the tags for your mp3s are inaccurate. • Album Art Grabber has two modes of finding covers. The default mode and the strict matching mode. If you are getting the wrong album covers set then turn on 'Strict Matching' under preferences. • Album Art Grabber works with ICS, though not with Google Music as they do not use Android's music database.

Want to ship an item now at low cost? Or want to earn money delivering a package, e.g. while on your way to work? PACKeTO is the cheapest and fastest way to deliver stuff now. Also a way for you to earn money delivering items. How does it work? - If you want an item delivered today simply enter on your phone the item you want delivered, the pick up location and destination and find people on the map that are near you available for delivery. You can then call them directly and negotiate the rate and any other details of the delivery. - If you want to earn some $ delivering, e.g. driving from work to home & can pick up a couple of items on your way? With a click on a button on your mobile, post your status as available and people that need an item delivered will know your location and will call you for a pick up at the rate you negotiate.

description: Juegos de lectura para niños/as de entre 3 a 5 años. Es la continuación de ' Aprender a Leer 1 ' y ' Aprender a leer 2 '. (también disponibles de manera gratuita). Se practica la lectura de palabras que engloban las sílabas practicadas en las dos primeras apps de 'Aprender a Leer', añadiendo sílabas inversas. Es decir, se trabajan sílabas simples con las letras M, P, L, S, N, Ñ, T, D, J e Y, a las que se añaden las sílabas inversas de la S, la L, la N y la M. Se trabaja con letra enlazada, que es la que mejor entienden los niños porque es la que se trabaja en los colegios. Esta es una ventaja con respecto a otras aplicaciones para móviles, que muestran el tipo de letra por defecto del móvil, y por tanto son menos educativas: la mejor letra para aprender a leer es la enlazada que se aprende en la escuela y es la que esta app ofrece. Reading games for children / as between 3-5 years. It is the continuation of 'Learning to Read 1' and 'Learning to read 2'. (Also available for free). Reading words that encompass practiced syllables in the first two apps for 'Learn to Read' is practiced, adding reverse syllables. Ie single syllables is working with letters M, P, L, S, N, N, T, D, J and Y, to which the inverse syllables of S is added, the L, N and M . It works with linked letter, which is best understood by children because that is what works in schools. This is an advantage over other mobile applications, showing the default font mobile, and therefore are less educational: the best lyrics of learning to read is the bound is learned in school and is the this app offers.

description: Fun and addictive Match-3 game!UP to 245 levels!AMAZING! NOTE:DO READ THE HELP CONTENT BEFORE YOU PLAY THIS GAME. The rules of this game changes a lot.So read the help content is very important to you!Play Happy! A classic hexagon Match-3 game launch on Android Market. How to play: 1.Touch the connected jewels with the same color，match 3 or more to break the blocks. 2.Match 6 or more jewels you will get a lighting.Touch the lighting and move your finger to another jewel,all of the jewels with the same color will blast. 3.Match 5 jewels you will get a star jewel,touch the jewel and all of the jewels nearby will blast. 4.If all blocks are broken before time used up,you win,or else you lose. 5.Now it is 245 levels.Amazing! If you like this game, please rate it and recommend to your friends. Thanks for playing!

Клон популярной портативной электронной игры с жидкокристаллическим экраном "ТАЙНЫ ОКЕАНА" ("Электроника ИМ-03"). Управляя водолазом необходимо добраться до клада и взять несколько мешочков с сокровищами (но не более 5). Водолазу мешает осьминог. За каждый взятый мешочек начисляется 1 очко. За возвращение в лодку начисляется количество очков, равное взятым мешочкам (но не более 3). Водолаз не может вернуться в лодку без мешочков. Рабочий водолаз не может находиться в лодку более 3 секунд. По истечении этого времени он автоматически спускается под воду. Если осьминог поймал водолаза, то их количество уменьшается. Игра заканчивается, если все водолазы пойманы. При достижении 200 и 500 очков штрафные очки сгорают (водолазов становится 3). По мере набора очков скорость движения щупалец осьминога увеличивается. Для начала игры нажмите кнопку "Game A" или кнопку "Game B". Во второй игре скорость движения щупалец осьминога несколько быстрее. Clone of the popular handheld electronic game with LCD screen "Secrets of the Ocean" ("Electronics MI-03"). Driving a diver needs to get to the treasure and take a few bags of treasure (but not more than 5). Prevents diver octopus. For each bag taken 1 point. For the return of the boat charged points equal taken sacs (but not more than 3). A diver can not return to the boat without bags. Work diver can not be in the boat for more than 3 seconds. After this time, it is automatically descends under water. If caught octopus diver, their number decreases. The game ends when all the divers caught. Upon reaching 200 points and 500 penalty points burned (divers becomes 3). As a set of points octopus tentacles speed increases. To start the game, click "Game A" or the "Game B". In the second game speed octopus tentacles slightly faster.

Permissions info: It requires Internet to fetch definitions via the Wordnik API. There's no ads whatsoever. WordLookup allows you to view word definitions easily as you browse the web, and when using apps. It's like the popular Google Chrome extension Google Dictionary, but for Android! If you have found this useful, please do rate, share & comment! Simply hold&select the word you wish to look up, share it with WordLookup and a small notification popup will show a few definitions for the word! It's that simple! No need to open another dictionary app! The little popup does not block you from browsing the web, as it is unobstructive and fades away after a short while. As featured on CNET: http://howto.cnet.com/8301-11310_39-57618586-285/add-a-pop-up-dictionary-to-android/ WordLookup is also open source: https://github.com/icechen1/WordLookup Here's how to use it: 1- Hold and select the word you'd like to get the definitions. 2- Select the Share button in the menu/Action Bar. 3- Share text to WordLookup. 4- The definitions should show up in a bit as a popup(Toast) notification. Supported Apps: -ICS Android Browser -Google Chrome -ICS Gmail and Email app -Google Reader -Pulse -Many,many others. More will be added in this list. Right now, this app is only tested on Android 4.0 - Ice Cream Sandwich, as many apps on earlier versions of Android do not support sharing text, your mileage may vary, though. It uses the Wordnik API to get definitions, so a Data/WIFI network connection is required. The options allows you to customize the notifications, such as the number of definitions shown and display time. Features like using other dictionary sources (offline dictionaries) are coming soon!
release_text: 0.2.0 - Text to speech now functional. Also some bug fix and optimization, so app should run faster now. 0.1.5 - Added a loading screen popup + optimizations. 0.1.2 - bugfix release for some crashes 0.1.1 - Improved the look of the popup, the filtering algorithm, and bugfixes. 0.1 - Initial release

This is English - Albanian and Albanian - English Dictionary (Fjalor Anglisht - Shqip dhe Shqip - Anglisht), containing 57000 translation articles. The Dictionary is OFFLINE and does not need the internet connection. Database size is more than 6MB. It will be downloaded when the application is run first time. We recommend you to use Wi-Fi connection. Main features: 1. History – every word you ever viewed is stored in history. 2. Favorites – you are able to add words to favorites list by clicking the “star” icon. 3. Managing History and Favorites lists – you are able edit those lists or clear them. 4. Various Settings – you may change application’s font and theme (choose one of several color themes). 5. Word spelling, using Text-To-Speech module (requires internet connection). Powered by iSpeech®. 6. Context word search – click any word in translation article and search for it’s translation. 7. Random word of the day widget. To see the widget in the list the application must be installed to phone memory (dictionary database may be installed anywhere). This app contains advertising.

description: "Спорт-Экспресс" и МТС представляют приложение "Мой Футбол", в котором вы найдете все, чем живет чемпионат России по футболу. В вашем распоряжении - все самые оперативные новости, статьи, фото- и видеорепортажи, онлайн-трансляции и статистическая информация. Скачав приложение, вы сможете настроить его под себя – выбрать только те команды, за которым вы хотите следить. Вам станут доступны: - новости о ваших любимых командах в режиме online; - аналитические материалы лучших спортивных журналистов страны; - обновляемая лента фоторепортажей; -видеохайлайты и авторские телепрограммы; - текстовые трансляции всех встреч Российской футбольной премьер-лиги; - полная статистика всех турниров с 1992 года, включая турнирные таблицы, календари матчей, таблицы бомбардиров и ассистентов, информацию о желтых и красных карточках и средних оценках по амплуа. Просим сообщать о всех замечаниях и предложениях по работе приложения на наш электронный адрес - sport@sport-express.ru с пометкой Android в теме письма. Мы приложим все усилия, чтобы сделать приложение "СЭ" еще более качественным и удобным. "Sport-Express" and MTS are the application "My Football", where you will find everything that lives of the Russian football championship. At your disposal - all the latest news, articles, photos and video reports, online broadcast and statistical information. After downloading the application, you can configure it for yourself - choose only those commands for which you want to monitor. You will be available: - News about your favorite teams in the online; - Analytical materials of the best sports journalists in the country; - Updated photo reports tape;  -Videohaylayty copyrights and television programs; - A text translation of all meetings of the Russian Premier League; - Full statistics of all tournaments since 1992, including standings, calendars matches scorers table and assistants, information on yellow and red cards and the average score on the line. Please report any comments and suggestions on the application to our email address - sport@sport-express.ru Android marked in the subject line. We will endeavor to make the application "SE" even more quality and comfortable.

app_name: 麻雀 天極牌 by Hangame
description: 登録不要ですぐに遊べる【ハンゲーム】のアプリ。 iPhoneで人気の麻雀アプリが、いよいよAndroidにも登場！ もちろん、iPhoneとのオンライン対戦も可能！ さらに、お使いのAndroid端末の横画面に最適化し、麻雀アプリ最大級の手牌サイズを実現！！ 無料オンラインアプリ「麻雀 天極牌(てんごくはい)」ですぐに全国のプレイヤーとオンライン対戦!強者に勝ち続けて天を極めよう! 【特徴】 ☆グラフィック ・麻雀アプリで最大級の手牌と捨て牌の大きさ。 ・操作性にこだわった洗練されたUI。 対戦画面は横画面にも縦画面でもプレイ可能。 ・白と黒を基調にしたスタイリッシュなデザイン! ・自由に写真などからマイアイコンを設定できます ☆ゲームモード ・全国のユーザーとプレイできる 「オンライン対戦」でアツい闘牌! ・個性豊かなキャラと戦い抜く「勝ち抜き戦」で オリジナル牌と称号をゲット! ・「フリー対戦」では、 オリジナルのキャラにカスタマイズでき、 ルールも変更して自分好みの麻雀を打てる! ・持ち点5000点でどこまで生き残れるか!? BOSSの八龍も登場する「サバイバル戦」を搭載! 八龍を倒してオリジナル卓をゲット！ ☆システム ・「東風/半荘戦」の他に、短い時間でも手軽にできる 「サシウマ対戦」システムを導入! ・「段位」を上げていく楽しみがあり 、「極印」で強さの証を手に入れ 、「称号」をたくさんコレクションし 、「チップ」をひたすら貯める! ・完全ランダムの配牌、 CPUの思考にもインチキは一切ありません! ・サクサク感にこだわった打牌スピード! 【初心者にも安心な機能】 ・「アシスト機能」で打牌の手助けをします! ・一人用「ツモ切り対戦」で じっくりと役作りを楽しめる! ・一人用ではプレイ中に「役一覧」で 役の確認ができる! 【中~上級者も納得の機能】 ・全国の猛者と「レーティング」で 自分の強さが比べられる! ・成長を感じられる160を超える膨大な「戦績」を 各モードごとに用意! ☆その他 ※ハンゲームへのログインは不要で、 利用同意をしたら、すぐにゲームを始められます。 ※OS2.3.3以上（ただしタブレットを除く）で動作確認を行っております。その他の機種に関しては動作を保証致しかねますことをご了承ください。 ※アップデート後にデータが初期化されたお客さまへ ・戦績データのロードは、起動後のオートログイン（画面下部の「ようこそ○○さんへ」）が完了した後に行われます。 ・このログインが行われませんとデータが初期設定のまま表示されますのでご注意ください。 ・3G回線や電波状況によりオートログインに多少の時間がかかる場合がございます。ご注意ください。 ※現在、SH-01Dでのみ効果音の読み込み時にメモリ負荷が異常にかかり強制切断になる端末固有の現象が起きております。今後の対応で改善を予定しておりますが、現状は上記端末をご利用のお客さまは申し訳ありませんが効果音をOFFにしてプレイして下さい。 ※Android天極牌は特定の端末で「自動ロック」によりアプリを強制切断してしまいます。短い秒数での自動ロックにご注意ください。 ※その他、今後も特定の機種のみで起こるバグの改善も行ってまいります。 ------------------------------------ 【麻雀 天極牌】の公式twitterです。 アップデート情報やバグ修正をツイートしていきますので、よろしければフォローをお願い致します。 @tengokuhai ※当アプリのアクセス許可について位置情報の取得に関する記述がありますが、実際には取得しておりません。
release_text: いつも麻雀 天極牌をご利用頂きありがとうございます！ 下記の内容のver2.0.6のアップデートを致します。 ・不具合修正 これからも麻雀 天極牌をよろしくお願い致します。

EduTamil is a simple android applications to educate kids in learning Tamil language. To give a small background of Tamil, it is one of the ancient languages of the world and is the official language of the southern Indian state Tamil Nadu, as well as one of the official language of Srilanka, Malaysia, and Singapore. There are significantly large communities of Tamil speakers in Mauritius and South Africa, as well as groups of more recent Tamil speaking emigrants living in Canada, Australia, USA and in many western European countries. Key Features of EduTamil: * Learn Alphabets - Uyir Ezhuthukkal (Vowels) * Learn Alphabets - Mei Ezhuthukkal (Consonants) * Learn Alphabets - UyirMei Ezhuthukkal (Compounds) Chart * Learn Basic Words - Varthaikkal (Words) * Learn Basic Numerals - Ilakkangal * READ Mode - Play with Tamil alphabet sound * WRITE Mode - Trace over the alphabet for the kids to practice * English Equivalent Text for Tamil Alphabets (Vowels & Consonants) with their English sound Other Features of EduTamil: * Portrait and Landscape orientation modes * One touch/tap full screen mode * Swipe Navigation * Button Navigation

Fully featured version of the popular No Signal Alert app. Featured in Lifehacker.com's "One Dozen Super-Useful Android Apps" as "Especially useful for when you’re expecting that important call that just isn’t coming (because it can’t!)..." Ever missed an important call because your phone had no signal and you never noticed? No Signal Alert detects when your phone is in a "dead zone" or with no reception and sends a customized notification of your choice (sound, vibrate, led color indicator, etc). No Signal Alert can keeps track of every time you loose and recover your phone signal, providing users with useful statistics such as time, location and address when signal was lost. Features: ★ Customize your alerts completely (sound, vibrate, led,etc.) ★ Record and maintain logs of your phone signal events ★ View map of your known dead-zones ★ 1x1 Home-screen monitoring widget ★ Signal meter gauge ★ View signal statistics for your carrier ★ Export logs to an Excel-supported CSV files ★ Backup and Restore your logs to your SD card ★ Supports GSM/CDMA Note: Please make sure to read the "Helpful tips" when you first install the application. We appreciate your feedback and encourage you to help us improve our products. Visit our website http://www.smartandroidapps.com and don't forget to check out our other apps in the market. Smart Android Apps, LLC

description: With ImperiHome, control your home automation systems and connected objects from a single and highly customizable interface. No need for a central server or dedicated setup. The application directly connects to your systems using APIs and allows you to remotely interact with all your devices. Currently, ImperiHome is able to connect to: - Myfox Home Control 2 (security and home control system) - Philips Hue (lighting system) - Vera, VeraLite (ZWave controller by Micasaverde / Vera Control) UI5, UI6 and UI7 - ZiBase (Multi-protocol controller by Zodianet) - eedomus (ZWave controller by Connected Object) - IPX800 (Relay controller by GCE Electronics) - Eco-Devices (Teleinfo energy counter by GCE Electronics) - Netatmo Weather Station - Koubachi Plant Sensor - LightManager (Controller by JBMedia) - Zipabox (Multi-protocol controller by Zipato) / Cameras and security features not yet supported - Systems implementing the ISS API (ImperiHome Standard System) - MJPEG, MPEG4, h264 IP cameras - … more will come! At home using your wall-mounted tablet or outside using your smartphone, take benefit of ImperiHome features to control your smart home the way you want: - fast and responsive user interface - voice recognition - NFC tags actions - charts module - customizable dashboards with smart widgets (limited in free version) - Android shortcuts - local or remote network auto detection - layouts for both smartphones and tablets - several options to fine-tune the application - import/export preferences (only in pro version) - Sony SmartWatch2 integration - Automatic wake-up using front camera move detection. WARNING: this feature is highly dependent on the type of device and camera. We can't guarantee it will work wit all devices. - Tasker Plugin (pro version only) - REST Control API (pro version only) - Android Wear support (voice commands and camera viewing) This is the free version of ImperiHome. Unlock pro features by installing also the ImperiHome Pro Unlocker: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.imperihome.lite.unlockerpro Check out more on ImperiHome webite ( http://www.imperihome.com ) and contact us at support@imperihome.com should you encounter any issue. Camera Translator is the easiest and most accurate way to translate text using your camera. With this app, you can translate text simply by taking a picture of it! Here's how to do it: (1) Take a photo of the text you would like to translate. Be sure that the text you want to translate is clear. (2) After taking the photo, you'll be taken to a screen where you can crop the text you want to translate. Be sure that only the text is selected in the crop box. (3) Once you crop the text, the app will attempt to recognize the text that you selected. If the text looks correct, hit the "translate" button. (4) The app will then translate the text for you into the language you desire! Supported Languages: Bulgarian Czech Danish Dutch English Estonian Finnish French German Greek Hungarian Italian Latvian Lithuanian Polish Portuguese Romanian Russian Slovakian Slovenian Spanish Swedish Turkish Ukrainian

Most of us enjoy watching our car's odometer cycle past interesting numeric patterns. For example, watching your car's odometer change from 99,999.9 to 100,000.0 is a significant event in the life of your car. Similarly we measure our lives by the years that pass. Some years are more significant to celebrate than others. But there are other significant numeric patterns in the chronology of our lives that would be fun to celebrate if only we could easily see when they are coming. For example, celebrating as you pass your billion-second mark might be more entertaining than celebrating a rather uninteresting 32nd birthday...and it happens just a few month before. Odometer of Life makes it easy to see and be notified about these interesting cycles in your life for many fun time intervals (like seconds, minutes, ...dog years, ...Martian years, etc.) and for as many time events as you would like. A car's odometer measures only miles OR kilometers, but not both. And a car only measures from it's creation. Odometer of Life can measure in many time intervals from many events in your life.

description: Live365 Radio is the world’s most diverse online radio network featuring thousands of human powered radio stations created by people from around the world. With the Live365 app for Android, anyone can easily discover and listen to thousands of unique Live365 radio stations anywhere they go. The Live365 Android app allows listeners to easily find the perfect station for any musical taste enabling the discovery of music and talk content you won’t find or hear anywhere else. The app features 260+ genres of music covering every imaginable genre ranging from Rock, Classical, Jazz, Electronic, Country, Gospel, Pop, Hip-Hop/R&B, International, Reggae, Broadway, Meditation, Oldies, Talk, and hundreds of other genres. Live365’s online radio stations are created by music and talk enthusiasts from hobbyists to professional broadcasters. In addition to thousands of user created radio stations, the Live365 network also features stations programmed from well known artists such as Johnny Cash, David Byrne, Pat Metheny, Jethro Tull, and more. Live365 is different from other Internet Radio services because Live365 provides each broadcaster with the platform and tools they need to create their own online radio station and reach a global audience. For the listener, this means more unique, diverse, and quality music and talk content over other radio services like AM/FM, Satellite, and other Online Radio networks with robotic playlists. Download the Live365 Radio app today and start enjoying the best in internet radio on your Android device! Listeners who love Live365: - “A great radio experience. It’s wonderful being able to choose from so many excellent genres and getting such depth in a radio experience. Real human programmers too!” - “This is the best online radio…period” - “Great app! Better than satellite! Rock on!” - “Makes radio great again.” - “Finding your stations has been a gift to me. Now I can listen at work and at home. LOVE IT!” For a commercial-free experience, listeners can become a Live365 VIP. Benefits of VIP include: • No Ads • Unlimited Access to All Live365 Stations • Personalized Recommendations • Exclusive Desktop App

description: Sixth Gear 2 gives you the opportunity to test your racing skills behind the wheels of many amazing super cars, pushing your determination to the edge in controlling hundreds of horsepower on the most daring roads. Sixth Gear 2 stuns through its high-definition graphics, a delight to all high-end tablet and phablet owners, while still allowing full control over the level of detail, to allow even casual devices to play the game smoothly. Start testing about well detailed cars from different categories. You will definitely not get bored driving the cars on a lot of racing tracks, each location being rendered in beautiful HD graphics for the different moments of the day. Take the extra challenge whenyou race on weather conditions are not the most favorable A career with different levels of difficulty takes your skills to the limit and challenges you to become the best pilot around. If you’ve finished racing through the difficulty levels, that doesn’t mean the game is over! You can still participate in world championships, where the most advanced pilots meet, or you can compete against your friends. Think you can handle it?

Trace Snow (formerly AlpineReplay) is the premiere ski and snowboard tracking app and is ranked as the #1 winter sports app by Men's Health magazine. Trace Snow is the most used and highest rated app for skiing and snowboarding in the world--our users log more than 2 billion feet of vertical a month! Trace Snow (formerly AlpineReplay) allows you to track your day on the mountain by measuring speed, airtime, distance, vertical, Calories, and more. Made by skiers and snowboarders for skiers and snowboarders. We separate your runs, tell you which chair lifts you've taken, clock your time on the chairlift and much more. Get a basic set of stats right on the slope or log in on AlpineReplay.com to see your progress over the season, compare with friends, push your stats to Facebook, and Replay your runs in 3D. With Trace Snow (formerly AlpineReplay) you can measure: ★ Speed ★ Airtime ★ Vertical ★ Distance ★ Calories ★ Time ★ Much more Trace Snow is also the official app , Steamboat, Winter Park Resort, Mt. Tremblant, Snowshoe, Stratton, Blue Mountain, China Peak, Mont-Sainte-Anne, Stoneham, and Canaan for the 2014/15 season. Use Trace Snow at these mountains to earn special medals, be notified of upcoming events, and much more!

description: Pixel Media Server is UPNP/DLNA compatible Digital Media Server on Android Platform (SmartPhone, Tablet, STB/TV). It shares digital media contents, such as Images (JPEG/PNG), songs (MP3, WAVE, FLAC, AAC, M4A etc.), videos (AVI, MP4, 3GP, MPEG, MPG, MKV, FLV, TS, MOV, M4V, RM, RMVB etc.) from your Android Device (SmartPhone/Tablet/Set-Top-Box) and make those contents available on wired/wireless network for other UPNP/DLNA compliant/certified devices, such as SmartTV, BlueRayPlayer, XBOX, Play Station, Android TV/STB/Player and many more devices. Pixel Media Server (Pixel DMS) can be discovered from home network using Digital Media Controller (DMC) or Digital Media Player (DMP). Using DMC or DMP, user can browse all media contents which are shared on Pixel Media Server from your Android Smart Phone/ Tablet and media contents can play back to "dlna-compliant" Render or Player, such as TV etc. There is no need for additional Media Servers, if you have Pixel Media Server running on your Android SmartPhone/ Tablet/ Set-Top-Box. Pixel Media Server is tested with well known UPNP/DLNA compliant/certified devices and various Android platform. Features: * "UPNP/DLNA" Compatible Digital Media Server for Android Platform * Support SSDP protocol for DMS discovery * User can Start DMS and Stop DMS with a single click from your Android phone * Share your complete mobile contents or select your desire folder * Set your DMS name as you wish * App autostart on device boot * On screen message for WiFi on/off * On screen message for DMS on/off * Keep track last folder selection from the server for next application launching * Support multiple device connections for media streaming from DMS * Pixel Media Server runs on Android Phones and Tablets and Android Set-Top-Box * Support multiple external storage device selection * Support popular video file formats: MKV, AVI, MPG, MP4, M4V, MPEG, TS etc. * Extended M3U playlist file supported. [you can share other servers contents (any HTTP server) to your network from Pixel Media Server] * Support WiFi/Tethering/Ethernet * Image Thumbnail * Video Thumbnail * Music AlbumArt * Support Subtitle (only SRT) Please provide your valuable feedback on Pixel Media Server (v 6.0). Please have a look for our other "dlna-compliant" apps on Android platform from CMC Limited. Digital Media Controller: "Pixel Media Controller – DLNA" Digital Media Renderer: "Pixel Media Renderer – DLNA DMR" Printing controller (+PR1+): "CMC DLNA Print Client" Daily Utility App: Scanner and Fax : "CMC Image Scanner" For any queries or issue related to Pixel Media server , please send e-mail to android@cmcltd.com We are happy to help you. description: Help Dipper and Mabel defend against creatures from all sides in this wild and funny strategy game that features five Gravity Falls locations with over 40 waves of excitement. Li’l Gideon has reassembled the shards of the Amulet of the Doomed and summoned supernatural minions from the great beyond to descend on the Mystery Shack and other locations around town in an all out assault meant to scare Dipper, Mabel and Grunkle Stan clear out of Gravity Falls, once and for all. You can help the Pines stop the onslaught of advancing creatures using cleverly weaponized gadgets and save Gravity Falls with these exciting game features: Defend five unforgettable locations: * The Mystery Shack: * Dusk 2 Dawn * Arcade * Summerween Superstore * Tent of Telepathy Use more than 20 awesome defensive items from the show: * Manotaur War Horn * Gnome Launcher * Sneezing Powder * and other items available in the store Summon powerful characters to help when you’re in trouble: * Giant Gnome Monster * Rumble McSkirmish * and other Gravity Fall characters to help along the way! Watch Gravity Falls on Disney XD Terms of Use: http://disneytermsofuse.com/

description: Help the bees to collect enough honey. Fill the jug with honey to pass the level. Remove obstacles and solve puzzles.

ENGLISH VERSION Four simple, fun educational games from owlieboo.com, a web site for babies, toddlers and young children. ANIMALS: to learn about animals and their sounds. JUNGLE: to travel to the jungle and meet its animals. LEAPS: to discover jumping and leaping animals. EGG: to meet small animals as they get out of their eggs. We paid special attention to our games not being violent or competitive: children never lose; rather, they play games with different degrees of difficulty, according to their maturity level. We hope that you will enjoy it!

Caccia al tesoro è un piccolo gioco che consiste nell'accoppiare le pedine uguali fra loro per ottenere magigori punti possibili! Accopiate navi, timoni, pistole e scrigni del tesoro! Ci saranno anche dei bonus che riconoscerete tra le pedine! Buona caccia del tesoro a tutti! Treasure Hunt is a small game that consists of pairing the identical pieces together to get magigori points as possible! Accopiate ships, rudders, pistols and treasure chests! There will also be bonus you will recognize one of the pawns! Good treasure hunting to all!

All in One Ghost Hunter App! Why pay MORE for other Ghost Hunting Apps that offer LESS? CAUTION - This application leverages sensors and frequencies that may disturb paranormal energies and disturb unknown entities. Please use with caution. This app is for entertainment purposes only, enjoy! Includes FIVE paranormal detection apps in one! EMF Detector Electromagnetic Frequency Detector uses the sensorometer and the built in magnetic frequency detector in your mobile device to detect paranormal field readings with the same accuracy as heavy equipment that costs thousands of dollars! A must have for every paranormal investigator! Paranormal Visual Scanner The only one of its kind! The Visual Scanner employs several complex algorithms which compute live data from the electromagnetic frequencies, the barometer, and hardware field sensors. This allows the Scanner to produce actual visual displays of disturbances as they occur! WARNING - Please exercise caution when approaching intense fields of activity as not all paranormal entities are friendly. EVP Detector Capture white noise in real time with the EVP Detector! No need for playback and analysis, the EVP detector has a built in analysis detection engine that interprets anomalous audio traffic and plays feedback in real time. This allows actual conversations with paranormal entities in real time! (NEW) RECORD EVP to SDCARD. This EVP Detector allows for up to 6 long term EVP recordings to be saved to the SD Card. The recordings can be played back immediately with the play button or specific recordings can be played back for analysis or deleted by using the corresponding menu button." (NEW) The Advanced Analysis EVP detector allows advanced and immediate analysis of EVP recordings. Recordings are saved to the device's memory bufer and can be played back at 9 various frequencies and speeds including reverse playback at 3 different frequencies! Best for use with short recordings in highly paranormal areas, longer recordings increases chances of force close error depending on the individual device's buffer space (NEW) Spirit Board - a ouija like board that uses sensor detection to answer Yes and No questions posed to it. Map The Map displays your present location as well as all of the established haunted locations in your area on a map for easy navigation. Locations are represented by graphics and background information on the various haunts. Map locations will be continuously updated so be sure to check for new locations as they arrive! CAUTION This app is for entertainment purposes only and the developer is not responsible for unforeseen paranormal activities and results. If you like this APP please rate it or leave a comment! It is greatly appreciated! If you dislike, are unhappy with, or believe this app to be the worst thing to ever happen to you in your life then please contact the developer, We have ALWAYS issued a COMPLETE refund whenever requested and strive to make this APP as fun and satisfying as it can possibly be.
